comments: Great game, anyone knocking it just unable to figure out the puzzle for themselves so they complain. Its no ones fault that youre a dummy but your own. Ads get annoying but take literally 2 seconds to just click back out of them. Wish it was longer but pretty good overall

Clever but also too cryptic at times. Needed the walkthrough a few times.  Was actually a space escape; not sure how different the actual Space Escape game by the same dev will be different.  Ads were so invasive that to complete a puzzle, it required airplane mode so the full puzzle could be viewed, sans ads.

Good but bad Good game sint get me wrong, graphics good but other than that I keep thinking I got a virus on my phone as pop ups randomly pop up on my phone. Also had to do a virus scan on my phone as it kept saying that there was a problem with this app!!

Very short game, approx 20 minutes play time. Graphics are good, but gameplay was spoilt by ads either hiding things or popping up at crucial times. Was enjoying the game until i needed to wear the spacesuit, this put a time limit on how long you could use it due to oxygen level. I don't play and absolutely hate time limits in games. As for selling clues, if you get stuck, watch one of the walkthroughs on YouTube for free.
Game seems good, but... It keeps saying it will give me money to remove adds and unlock all hints, but then tries to charge me when I tap on it.
WORST GAME EVER PLAYED I didn't like it too complicated and I'm pretty sure all the creator wants is money from ads.

comments: Man let me tell you, I just installed it and played it for 1 1/2 hrs straight got all the way to the middle of the 3rd lvl had 400k to upgrade and accidently exited out of menu screen but logged right back in and everything was gone. It's a little repetitive but extremely fun and rewarding seeing how fast you can press attack buttons without fn up. would have been one of my goto games but to bummed out to play it again so will have to uninstall😧

'Infinity' is right. This game is in serious need of balancing. After doing one challenge run I had enough gold to power up my guy 500% stronger than base, and just walked through the rest of the repetitive game, that consists of 3 sentences of nigh irrelevant story. Thumbs down.
Great idea that's poorly executed. There is no way to save progress and I'm not really into sitting here and redoing everything I've already done countless times. Uninstalled.

Great idea with eternal succeeding. Cool effects but you won't see them because you'll be concentrated on the bottom part of the screen. Until you girlfriend takes the phone to play. Interesting and intense gameplay. Meta game is cool too. Graphic style is ok, but could be richer, UI especially (thick borders aren't cool). Maybe some narrative enrichment or extra meta gameplay could make overall experience better.
just add more epic music and sound effect
Fun little twitch game, don't expect the depth of an RPG such as EverQuest

description: Mensch is a board game developed in Germany by Josef Friedrich Schmidt in 1907 or 1908.The game was issued in 1914 and sold about 70 million copies, driven by huge popularity among German troops serving in World War I It is a cross and circle game with the circle collapsed onto the cross, similar to the Indian game Pachisi, the Colombian game Parqués, the American games Parcheesi, Aggravation, and Trouble, and the English game Ludo.
descriptionHTML:
Mensch is a board game developed in Germany by Josef Friedrich Schmidt in 1907 or 1908.

The game was issued in 1914 and sold about 70 million copies, driven by huge popularity among German troops serving in World War I It is a cross and circle game with the circle collapsed onto the cross, similar to the Indian game Pachisi, the Colombian game Parqués, the American games Parcheesi, Aggravation, and Trouble, and the English game Ludo.
summary: Ludo is a board game developed in Germany by Josef Friedrich Schmidt in 1907
title: Ludo

You need to choose one of the presented categories: architecture, food, animals, landscapes, transport and others. In each category there are 8 pictures that can be collected. Your task is to move pieces of puzzles and put them in the right place! You can puzzle a puzzle for a different number of details: 56 or 100 pieces. Also, in the game settings, you can always select a difficulty level, including or disabling the background hint to the picture. I think everyone will be able to choose a picture for themselves, because the game has collected 80 colorful images. And still, you can arrange competitions, who will quickly assemble the puzzle, time timer will help you, it will record your results and determine who won. And during the game you can always look at the picture that you are now collecting, in order to understand what place to put a piece of the puzzle. Also, if you need to leave, there is an opportunity to save the game, and continue the next time from the moment you left off."Puzzles without the Internet" are the best puzzles in the world, for children and adults. After all, to collect puzzles from individual elements is an exciting activity that allows you to spend leisure time. Children folding different pictures, train motor skills and develop spatial thinking. And for adults, picking up puzzles helps to get away from the hassle and get ready to think.

comments: I wouldn't say that this bg app is difficult. It's currently limited in features. Skill expectations are low, but it's great to relax with. Love the "king for a day" feature, gives you a goal beyond just winning the current game.  It currently only supports single game mode which is fun for a quick game, but I prefer more of a challenge. So, I'm hoping that they'll add more features in the future. A 3-pt match with the use of doubling cube would be nice. Only drawback is that players don't appear to be very experienced and getting a game with a bet higher than 2600 is impossible, which makes this boring for me. Was just promised tournament mode if I update. I reinstall to latest version. Not even the promise of tournament mode now. Just lost a 🌟 for that. App lost another 🌟. Tourney room is back. I'll be d***ed if I'm paying $5 to play it though.

description: Core - this is a small lightning"ball" that will pull you in it’s world forever, will open for you cool, exciting offline games of a stylish interface! Download this offline game right now, press the start button, and the lightening ball’s "adventures" in the world of geometric shapes begin!MISSIONThis no Internet game is endless. The goal of the arcade Core is to put a personal record, and even to become # 1 among friends. And to complete a mission and to beat the record you need to fly as fast as possible, bend all obstacles on the way as quickly as you only can and to collect ALL the bonuses (glowing balls) that you only meet on your adventure.HOW TO PLAY?To bring a Core into a motion, it's enough just to tap on the screen. The more you press on the screen, the faster it flies.You need to make this luminous ball fly into the falling figure that rotates and fly of it out. Each figure has one free edge - the entrance to it, in the same time it’s exit, which will change it’s location with the figure rotations . Therefore, get close to the falling figure, when it is turned by the free edge down, and fly out of it when it turns the free edge up. All these manipulations should be done until the figure falls. And this will take just a second and even a half of a second, so you need to be really quick! You can not touch the figures!First you will face with simple triangles and squares, but the further you go, the harder the construction of figures of this no Internet  game are, and the harder it will be to overcome them. Sometimes neither one, nor two, but many figures will move towards you. For example, a combination of stars, or circles, or any other figures that not only rotate about their axis, but they also can move along a completely incomprehensible trajectory, may come upon you. In this case, you have nothing to do but look for the passages between them and as quickly as possible slip across. Just do not forget to collect bonuses - small lightening balls!Download the arcade CORE RIGHT NOW, but be careful, because you can become addictive to this game!
descriptionHTML:
Core - this is a small lightning"ball" that will pull you in it’s world forever, will open for you cool, exciting offline games of a stylish interface! Download this offline game right now, press the start button, and the lightening ball’s "adventures" in the world of geometric shapes begin!

MISSION

This no Internet game is endless. The goal of the arcade Core is to put a personal record, and even to become # 1 among friends. And to complete a mission and to beat the record you need to fly as fast as possible, bend all obstacles on the way as quickly as you only can and to collect ALL the bonuses (glowing balls) that you only meet on your adventure.

HOW TO PLAY?

To bring a Core into a motion, it's enough just to tap on the screen. The more you press on the screen, the faster it flies.
You need to make this luminous ball fly into the falling figure that rotates and fly of it out. Each figure has one free edge - the entrance to it, in the same time it’s exit, which will change it’s location with the figure rotations . Therefore, get close to the falling figure, when it is turned by the free edge down, and fly out of it when it turns the free edge up. All these manipulations should be done until the figure falls. And this will take just a second and even a half of a second, so you need to be really quick! You can not touch the figures!
First you will face with simple triangles and squares, but the further you go, the harder the construction of figures of this no Internet game are, and the harder it will be to overcome them. Sometimes neither one, nor two, but many figures will move towards you. For example, a combination of stars, or circles, or any other figures that not only rotate about their axis, but they also can move along a completely incomprehensible trajectory, may come upon you. In this case, you have nothing to do but look for the passages between them and as quickly as possible slip across. Just do not forget to collect bonuses - small lightening balls!

Download the arcade CORE RIGHT NOW, but be careful, because you can become addictive to this game!
summary: Tap the screen and join Core's adventures in the world of geometric shapes!
title: CORE

description: From the creators of Airport Scanner comes the sequel, Airport Scanner 2!  This super addicting luggage scanning game now has a brand new 3D gameplay experience and a Player versus Player smuggling game!Work your way through over 100 missions at 50 airports across the US. Build your rank by stopping the bad guys from bringing bad things through security while still getting the flights out on time! Stay on top of ever changing rules and regulations, while working at busier and busier airports.Use your X-RAY scanner to look through carry-on luggage and find the prohibited items. Your scanner is equipped with a high-tech 3D exploded view that lets you really get in there and see what’s in the bags. If that’s not enough, you can also equip your scanner with an arsenal of handy power-ups that can help you handle even the craziest bags.This time around there are also smugglers! These sneaky passengers will try to smuggle a valuable collectable past your scanner in the midst of the frantic action. If you find the collectable you get to add it to your collection and the smuggler will join your team! Then you can then send your new smuggler to another player’s airport and help you build your collection of collectables!  Just pack the collectable into in a bag and send it to a friend or random opponent and hopefully they wont find it! Can you find or smuggle every collectable in the game?FEATURES * New 3D exploded view scanning mode.* Multiple viewing angles just like real X-RAY scanners.* Smuggle collectable items past your friends for an extra reward in the new PvP gameplay! * Find 100+ rare collectable items.* 50 airports with multiple missions means hours of enjoyment.* Real TSA Prohibited and Allowed Items.  * Fully Upgradable X-RAY Scanner with power-ups.* Line management - fast track first class passengers and get flight crew on their flights with just one tap!* Line management Rewards – collect coins and upgrades for successfully completing line management. game.* Lots of brain-bending rule variations that keep you on your toes.ADDITIONAL FEATURES * Challenge your friends by trying to smuggle collectables by them.* 3D baggage screening and beautiful graphics.
descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Airport Scanner comes the sequel, Airport Scanner 2! This super addicting luggage scanning game now has a brand new 3D gameplay experience and a Player versus Player smuggling game!

Work your way through over 100 missions at 50 airports across the US. Build your rank by stopping the bad guys from bringing bad things through security while still getting the flights out on time! Stay on top of ever changing rules and regulations, while working at busier and busier airports.

Use your X-RAY scanner to look through carry-on luggage and find the prohibited items. Your scanner is equipped with a high-tech 3D exploded view that lets you really get in there and see what’s in the bags. If that’s not enough, you can also equip your scanner with an arsenal of handy power-ups that can help you handle even the craziest bags.

This time around there are also smugglers! These sneaky passengers will try to smuggle a valuable collectable past your scanner in the midst of the frantic action. If you find the collectable you get to add it to your collection and the smuggler will join your team! Then you can then send your new smuggler to another player’s airport and help you build your collection of collectables! Just pack the collectable into in a bag and send it to a friend or random opponent and hopefully they wont find it! Can you find or smuggle every collectable in the game?


FEATURES
* New 3D exploded view scanning mode.
* Multiple viewing angles just like real X-RAY scanners.
* Smuggle collectable items past your friends for an extra reward in the new PvP gameplay!
* Find 100+ rare collectable items.
* 50 airports with multiple missions means hours of enjoyment.
* Real TSA Prohibited and Allowed Items.
* Fully Upgradable X-RAY Scanner with power-ups.
* Line management - fast track first class passengers and get flight crew on their flights with just one tap!
* Line management Rewards – collect coins and upgrades for successfully completing line management. game.
* Lots of brain-bending rule variations that keep you on your toes.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
* Challenge your friends by trying to smuggle collectables by them.
* 3D baggage screening and beautiful graphics.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and game tweaks, PVP improvements.
summary: Airport Scanner 2, now in 3D
title: Airport Scanner 2

description: Play a variety of quirky mini-games in Frantics™ on PlayStation®4 with this Frantics™ Companion App.Challenge your friends and family in everything from crazy arena brawls to wacky races for up to four players. Your charmingly unfair fox host will help you sabotage your rivals, but beware – he’s helping them too!It’s easy to join in – just use your smartphone or tablet as a controller to shake, tilt, swipe and snap. You may even find that the Fox calls you for secret missions...Make sure your PS4™ console is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.Use this app to:•	Choose an animal to play as and shake your device to randomize it.•	Snap a selfie to show who’s who in the game.•	Play nice or sabotage other players in mini-games using your own screen. •	Receive texts and calls from the Fox to help you win.This application can be used in the following languages:English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Finnish, Mexican Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.PlayLink for PS4™ titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4™, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controllers. playstation.com/playlinkforps4This app turns your device into a controller. PS4™ console, Frantics™ and the Frantics™ Companion App are required to play. PS4™ console and Frantics™ are sold separately.The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to the use of this app, depending on your country of residence:playstation.com/legal/software-usage-terms/
descriptionHTML:
Play a variety of quirky mini-games in Frantics™ on PlayStation®4 with this Frantics™ Companion App.

Challenge your friends and family in everything from crazy arena brawls to wacky races for up to four players. Your charmingly unfair fox host will help you sabotage your rivals, but beware – he’s helping them too!

It’s easy to join in – just use your smartphone or tablet as a controller to shake, tilt, swipe and snap. You may even find that the Fox calls you for secret missions...

Make sure your PS4™ console is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.

Use this app to:
• Choose an animal to play as and shake your device to randomize it.
• Snap a selfie to show who’s who in the game.
• Play nice or sabotage other players in mini-games using your own screen.
• Receive texts and calls from the Fox to help you win.

This application can be used in the following languages:
English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Finnish, Mexican Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.

PlayLink for PS4™ titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4™, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controllers. playstation.com/playlinkforps4

This app turns your device into a controller. PS4™ console, Frantics™ and the Frantics™ Companion App are required to play. PS4™ console and Frantics™ are sold separately.

The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to the use of this app, depending on your country of residence:
playstation.com/legal/software-usage-terms/
developerAddress:
PlayStation Mobile Inc.
2207 Bridgepointe Parkway
San Mateo, CA 94404
United States
summary: The companion app needed to play Frantics™ on PlayStation®4.
title: Frantics

descriptionHTML:
Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft!

Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! Create buildings using blocks and become the ultimate builder! Create a Paris from the scratch! Use blocks to build and unleash your creativity! Build anything! From a cottage house to a skyscraper!

Craft items and use them to decorate your apartment in Paris. Become an interior designer - the french style! Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design items to make the most unique interior design ever!

Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant!

Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala!

Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!

Craft & Build
Simply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!

Play Minigames
Play minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Casino, dancing and singing rhythm minigames are waiting for you!

Explore the infinite world
You can travel anywhere you want! Use cars, metro, trains or even planes and helicopter! The world is infinite! You can ride horse or ride a bike - it’s your choice. Simply craft one of the items and use it!

Become an interior and exterior designer
Use one of over 200 items to prepare the most awesome interior design of your french mansion! Chairs, tables, drawers, desks! Design the kitchen, design the bathroom and become the legend of a interior design!

Paris Craft - one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. PLAY NOW!

description: This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!>How to play?Place the pieces into board. descriptionHTML:
This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!
It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.
It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!

>How to play?
Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.
Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.

>Highlights:
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.
You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
summary: Amazing block game with a simple rule.
title: Puzzle Game

comments: The game was ok, I dont like it because the music kinda sounded like a mess, when I tapped it took forever to register, and forgot to add that the music sounded like a 2 year old trying to play an instrument. Background needed decoration and different colors than just yellow. It was also very glitchy and I deleted it in the first 30 seconds of me playing it. Forgot to add about music, it sounded like a mash of tons of people trying to sing and play instruments  and tons of animals making noise.

Nothing fantastic, those bouncing birds are from forever ago. The music in the background sounds like a 4 year old tried  to copy candy crush and crash bandicoot. The ads tho.. just too much. Made me uninstall immediately.
Great Game! I found what I was looking for! A breather from the same ol' same games out there...this birdy challenge cracks me up and keeps me on my beak, I mean toes! Lol...
Art theft. The artist already contacted them but the person who created the game claimed that it's different only because it's for the game when the animation is the exact same.

The art was copied from a artist called kéké. You can find examples of their art on YouTube by kéké and on Tumblr at k-eke. As far as I've seen, the examples they gave on Tumblr match up with the ones in the game. And when confronted the company refused to acknowledge it. Delete the game.
Art is stolen. Do not download because doing so supports art theft

description: Mountain Assault Shooting ArenaReload Your Assault Gun, More Enemy Army Troopers are Coming.Welcome to a brand new shooting game of 2018. The enemy has swarmed in the jungle and are conducting offensive strikes against our country. The armed forces cannot engage with any full fledge frontline pvp battle. Because this could rage war between two countries. But this thing need to be tackled within no time to stop cover strike commando. The enemy has also build up hideouts and are attacking from behind. Now the strategic reply should be given from our side by our commando. For this, the high command has hired a commando to crush the enemy forces. You have to play the character of war strike commando. Your ultimate duty is to retaliate the enemy attack. The jungle is very dense with a lot of cover, so war strike commando needs to be very careful.The gameplay of this game is very thrilling. Players of every age will definitely enjoy with dozens of sequenced frontline pvp battle levels. The initial missions are very easy as compared to last ones. Because the difficulty level increases as you proceed more inside the war strike commando game. You are the only best man to conduct operation in a jungle swarming with hostile forces. There are different weapons in the armory that you can use in cover strike commando game. But only primary gun is available and you have to buy other stuff. The mission tasks are different in each mission of this covert ops commando game. This will definitely test your shooting skills to a whole new level. Furthermore, the gadget includes mini radar to show your position on the ground in this covert ops commando game. You will also get paid with cash on completing each mission. Spend it to buy new weapons, med packs and grenades to win cover strike commando game. You should be prepared every moment, because the enemy is battle hardened and well trained.The controls of this frontline pvp battle game are very easy. Even players of every age will enjoy their spare time with fun. The button placement is ideal in this war strike commando game. You have one section for movement and other to perform actions. The action buttons include fire, reload, change stance and miscellaneous to provide ease of playing this commando pvp shooting game. You can also have a strategic look via radar showing enemy positions. So paly more and enhance your experience in commando pvp shooting games.Best of Luck…! Commando Grand Shooting Mission 2018 Features:Realistic 3D graphicsDifferent weapons availableDozens of missionsReal in-game soundsDifficult tasks with a lot of coverSequenced missionsMed pack, guns and grenadesIf you have no wifi, you can play Commando Extreme Deadly Attack 3D, absolutely free.So quickly download this interesting Commando Extreme Deadly Attack 3D game of 2018 offered by Gamers Pulse Inc. available on Google Play Store on your android smart phones.

description: The Solitaire 5 in 1 offers FIVE of the best Solitaire card games in one app!KLONDIKEKlondike is the most popular card game which can draw 1 or 3 poker card a time. Timeless & Classic Solitaire. Clear all the cards from the table using one or three-card draw. Also try out Traditional or Vegas scoring!SPIDER SOLITAIREThis game has 10 columns and 8 suit of cards(A to King) on the table, you should clear all of them. Play single suit or challenge yourself with four suits!FREECELLThe goal of it is to build up all cards on foundations to 4 left conner pos from Ace to King by following suit. Be strategic and use the four extra cells to move cards around and try to clear all cards from the table. FreeCell rewards players who think several moves ahead.3 PEAKSSelect cards in a sequence, earn combo points, and clear as many boards as you can before you run out of deals! You have to strategically move the cards from each tower to win the game.HILLCombine two cards that add up to 13 to remove them from the board. Challenge yourself to reach the top of the hill and clear as many boards as you can!Game Features:- cooking system- support drag & drop and tap control- animated cards motion- statistics- free hint function- Support phones and tablets- HD images- Support from the small screen all the way up to the large screen tablet.- Sound effect that can be turned on/offTry this Solitaire 5 in 1, you will enjoy it
descriptionHTML:
The Solitaire 5 in 1 offers FIVE of the best Solitaire card games in one app!

KLONDIKE
Klondike is the most popular card game which can draw 1 or 3 poker card a time. Timeless & Classic Solitaire. Clear all the cards from the table using one or three-card draw. Also try out Traditional or Vegas scoring!

SPIDER SOLITAIRE
This game has 10 columns and 8 suit of cards(A to King) on the table, you should clear all of them. Play single suit or challenge yourself with four suits!

FREECELL
The goal of it is to build up all cards on foundations to 4 left conner pos from Ace to King by following suit. Be strategic and use the four extra cells to move cards around and try to clear all cards from the table. FreeCell rewards players who think several moves ahead.

3 PEAKS
Select cards in a sequence, earn combo points, and clear as many boards as you can before you run out of deals! You have to strategically move the cards from each tower to win the game.

HILL
Combine two cards that add up to 13 to remove them from the board. Challenge yourself to reach the top of the hill and clear as many boards as you can!

Game Features:
- cooking system
- support drag & drop and tap control
- animated cards motion
- statistics
- free hint function
- Support phones and tablets
- HD images
- Support from the small screen all the way up to the large screen tablet.
- Sound effect that can be turned on/off

Try this Solitaire 5 in 1, you will enjoy it

description: Fasten your seat belt, get ready for an impossible ride on impossible track. Grab your favorite vehicle and start your car racing game now!Get groovy with high end sports cars on mega ramp. Sports cars not your choice? No worries, try muscle cars, mountain cars or you can even try huge trucks and demolition derbies monster vehicles. If you still looking for more fun  or ready to have great stunt driving then we also have train driving take off on mega ramp with high speed demolishing and crushing all other cars or trucks on the way.Take a real test of driving trains or cars on impossible tracks, jump off from a great speed to land and crush parking cars or trains on the ground to earn skill points.It's not a rooftop jump or normal stunt likely found in action games. You must take a high speed on the ramp, control the speed and jump off the track to destroy various monster vehicles. But be careful while car driving on slope as your car drifts like hell. Car drifting games are little easy to control but this simulator game will test your driving skills.

Fasten your seat belt, get ready for an impossible ride on impossible track. Grab your favorite vehicle and start your car racing game now!

Get groovy with high end sports cars on mega ramp. Sports cars not your choice? No worries, try muscle cars, mountain cars or you can even try huge trucks and demolition derbies monster vehicles. If you still looking for more fun or ready to have great stunt driving then we also have train driving take off on mega ramp with high speed demolishing and crushing all other cars or trucks on the way.

Take a real test of driving trains or cars on impossible tracks, jump off from a great speed to land and crush parking cars or trains on the ground to earn skill points.

It's not a rooftop jump or normal stunt likely found in action games. You must take a high speed on the ramp, control the speed and jump off the track to destroy various monster vehicles. But be careful while car driving on slope as your car drifts like hell. Car drifting games are little easy to control but this simulator game will test your driving skills.
developerAddress: Redcorner Games, Financial District, Hyderabad, India.
recentChanges: Endless free fun games of mega ramp impossible stunts 2018. Enjoy the game!
summary: Take a ride into mega ramp and perform impossible stunts
title: Mega Ramp: Free Impossible Stunts

comments: Its way to hard to win and and the stats do nothing.  You have to be perfect and even then they fly by.  Still LOVE this game.  Just takes away the fun when you get left in the dust and you play the same lvl a million times hoping maybe one time you will be perfect.

You shouldve stuck to the roots pf the game.  You made the game very 2 dimensional by removing the acceleration boost you get from doing flips like you had in the first game, not to mention you also dumbed down the contols. You shouldve kept the original style of the first one. Mad Skillz BMX is one of the only reasons i keep my tiny ipod touch around.

The game is fun up until around the third level. After that it becomes near impossible to win any races without spending actual money to upgrade your bike. Had a lot of fun with it up until that point, but it's definitely not worth spending actual money on. Deleted the game after pay to win clearly became a necessity.

I expected the physics to be as flawless as Turborilla's MX games but they're not at all. Clunky, inconsistent physics leave you shaking your head and trying in vain to sum up what you did differently than the 100 previous attempts.

Awesome game!  Earning money is easy especially with online play and watching ads.  ONLY downfall is earning gold can be a pain,  seem like the only way to get gold is by beating a boss, buying gold with real cash and levelling up which can take some time.  Other then that it's a very addictive game if you love BMX that is.  Folloq me on instagram @evans_customz

Very good game but I wish there was a better way of getting gold without having to pay out of your hard working money. Since when did games start asking for cash? I would pay to buy the game but buying gold is stupid as hell.. either way very good game
description: Mad Skills BMX 2 has finally arrived! See for yourself why Mad Skills games have been installed more than 40 million times worldwide, by action sports enthusiasts, professional athletes, and casual gamers alike. This is side-scrolling racing action as you’ve never experienced it, racing against people from across the globe on carefully designed tracks that will challenge your skills and — sometimes — your sanity.- Amazing physics that combine elements of realism with arcade fun- 7 different bikes that can be unlocked, upgraded, and customized- Tons of rider customization options to help you achieve your own on-track look- Dozens of hand-crafted tracks, with more added every single week for free- Weekly Jam competitions carried over from the smash-hit game Mad Skills Motocross 2- Competition with friends, people from your state or region, and international players- Evil bosses to defeat — a Mad Skills first!Mad Skills BMX 2 will get major developer support, ensuring tons of meaningful updates in the weeks, months, and years to come. We already have additional game modes in the works!Learn tips and tricks by watching our weekly show, The Turborilla Show, at twitch.com/turborillagames!Support: turborilla.helpshift.com/a/bmx-2/ (Have a problem? descriptionHTML:
Mad Skills BMX 2 has finally arrived! See for yourself why Mad Skills games have been installed more than 40 million times worldwide, by action sports enthusiasts, professional athletes, and casual gamers alike. This is side-scrolling racing action as you’ve never experienced it, racing against people from across the globe on carefully designed tracks that will challenge your skills and — sometimes — your sanity.

- Amazing physics that combine elements of realism with arcade fun
- 7 different bikes that can be unlocked, upgraded, and customized
- Tons of rider customization options to help you achieve your own on-track look
- Dozens of hand-crafted tracks, with more added every single week for free
- Weekly Jam competitions carried over from the smash-hit game Mad Skills Motocross 2
- Competition with friends, people from your state or region, and international players
- Evil bosses to defeat — a Mad Skills first!


Mad Skills BMX 2 will get major developer support, ensuring tons of meaningful updates in the weeks, months, and years to come. We already have additional game modes in the works!

Learn tips and tricks by watching our weekly show, The Turborilla Show, at twitch.com/turborillagames!

description: 😜 You can’t miss this! The latest crazy installment of Troll Face Quest (Youtube Memes Edition) is finally here! Never heard of Troll Face? With more than 33 million installs worldwide, this series is insanely successful! This time you’re taken on a hilarious adventure where you’ll solve brain-teasing puzzles and try to make sense of impossible situations while trolling the most famous video game characters in history.😊 To spare their embarrassment, we’re not mentioning any names here, but the classic heroes of first-person shooters, Italian plumbers, fruit-craving ninjas, fearsome orcs, candy-clogged puzzles and innocent test subjects trapped in labs filled with portals won’t escape Troll Face’s ridiculous pranks. 😬 TROLL OR BE TROLLED?How do you make sense of a world that makes no sense? Is it crazy, or are you just crazy? Try to keep it together as you work your way through more than 30 wacky levels, or lose it when you get trolled for the umpteenth time. • 30+ totally crazy and funny puzzles that will make you LOL• Experience new controls • Unlock wacky achievements• Conquer the global leaderboard• Play anytime, anywhere no wi-fi needed😁 So whether you’re a young gamer hooked on the latest and greatest MMORPG or a less young one filled with nostalgia for the days when the NES, Game Boy and Mega Drive reigned supreme, you’re sure to get a kick out of Troll Face Quest: Video Games.   We love your feedback! What’s your favorite level? Let us know in the reviews!#puzzle, #trolls, #free, #videogames

comments: This app is really fun... but the multiplayer seems to only work the the first time you open the app after going back into the app which I've deleted and redownloaded twice it says there is and error I've reset my phone as well. So if this can be fixed this'll be an almost perfect app

As an expirienced player i love the game, more the multiplayer than single. But i have encountered some recurring ploblems. The game crashes alot, i am offen timed out when wanting to pick a player becuase i have to 'wait for the opponent' for some reason. Also time times the opponent is timed out and the game freezes on the timed out screen, which happends frequently. Also for salty players who just quit at soon as they dont get the captain they want and leave, there are no repercussions in which their should be so that they dont have a perfect record. I love the game and it passes time but the problems make me only rate the game a 3 star rather than a 4 or 5.

Overall one of the most addictive and fun games I played for years. But dev team pleaaaaaaase! Create a multi open option for packs. I wouldn't even mind that you could for instance, apply a penalty for opening many packs at once like dice roll decrease on packs luck. But sometimes sitting at so many closed packs makes me wanna quit the game just for the sake of boredom, having to click 4 times to open, wait for the loading times and doing this over and over again. This ruins the gameplay a little for me. Regardless, easily one of the best games available in the play store. Extremely well done Dev team.
- Multiplayer doesnt work - The claim weekly reward stays at 0% forever. - There arent any sounds or music, and that is bad! Please fix! SONY xperia m2
The trading system is broke. Ive lost so many players due too trading. When i offer a trade accept and they get my cards/ money but i dont get what they offer!!!
The game was good. But now it just keeps freezing in on me and it stops all the the time. I try to do an sbc and it crashes and now I can't even open any type of packs because the app crashes.
description: The new FUT 18 Draft Simulator by PacyBits is here, and our best game has gotten even better. Draft the latest FUT players, build your squads, enter tournaments, and collect awesome rewards. Challenge other players and test your draft-building skills in the brand new Online Drafts. descriptionHTML:
In this game, you control a small character, armed with a pickaxe and spear.
You are tasked with harvesting nearby resources with this pickaxe, such as wood and stone.
With these resources, you can then begin building your base, beginning with a Gold Stash.
With your Gold Stash built, start harvesting gold by placing Gold Mines.

Raise the gun, collect the resources, build the buildings. There are dozens of strategies on this area!

description: Ladybug Super Hero girl has to pass lots of evil crocs, spiders and dragons and also go through noir castles. You are Ladybug - the cool superhero girl!But be careful! Lots of dangers, enemies, troubles, obstacles, difficult traps and bosses are defending your way through the jungle, castles and wonder worlds.To finish the platformer game Super Ladybug will have to jump and run over many obstacles, fight and shoot against chibi ninjas, cruel crocs, hedgehogs, skeletons, leps, cats and many other monsters and dragons.Climb up huge miraculous bridges, mountains and stairs, fight against prehistoric enemies, avoid falling bricks, find hidden noir blocks and levels, collect coins, swim through dangerous seas, explore lot of challenging and addictive jungle worlds and lands and defeat all cruel bosses and enemies.This miraculous Jump and Run is an addictive old school arcade jungle adventure game!Exciting features of Ladybug Adventures:+ 4 different addictive worlds (miraculous land, crazy noir forest, egypt world and cave sphere) + 80 wonderful, well-designed, exciting and challening levels with slowly increasing game difficulty+ 8 awesome boss fights (angry scorpion, dangerous spider, bee cat golem and crocodile boss) in 8 different dark castles+ great number of power ups, bonus rounds, secret blocks and bonus items+ over 20 various, great animated enemies such as crocs, cats, frogs, spiders, monsters, dragons, snails and many more+ great mix between 2D and 3D graphics in very high resolution+ retro arcade music and old school sound effects+ perfect, intuitve super game control through retro console games control pad+ special skills hidden in destroyable blocks and bricks+ awesome gameplay reminding to retro classic dash games+ water and sea worlds - jumping, running, fighting AND swimming!+ try to unlock all achievements and to be number one of leaderboards!How to play Ladybug Adventures:+ click right or left on your control pad for moving ladybug super hero girl!+ down-button is for ducking and also to get to some bonus levels (under tree stumps)+ press B-button to make Super Ladybug jumping!+ press A-button AND right or left for running; press A and B together for a higher and wider jump!+ by eating an apple you will become Super Silver Ladybug, get magic powers and then be able to destroy bricks!+ by eating golden flowers you will become Super Golden Ladybug and be able to throw fireballs + ladybug also can swim sometimes - press A-Button multiple times to swim higher ... release finger from button to go down!Have fun with this cool new super adventure platformer tale game!
descriptionHTML:
Ladybug Super Hero girl has to pass lots of evil crocs, spiders and dragons and also go through noir castles. You are Ladybug - the cool superhero girl!
But be careful! Lots of dangers, enemies, troubles, obstacles, difficult traps and bosses are defending your way through the jungle, castles and wonder worlds.
To finish the platformer game Super Ladybug will have to jump and run over many obstacles, fight and shoot against chibi ninjas, cruel crocs, hedgehogs, skeletons, leps, cats and many other monsters and dragons.
Climb up huge miraculous bridges, mountains and stairs, fight against prehistoric enemies, avoid falling bricks, find hidden noir blocks and levels, collect coins, swim through dangerous seas, explore lot of challenging and addictive jungle worlds and lands and defeat all cruel bosses and enemies.

This miraculous Jump and Run is an addictive old school arcade jungle adventure game!

Exciting features of Ladybug Adventures:
+ 4 different addictive worlds (miraculous land, crazy noir forest, egypt world and cave sphere)
+ 80 wonderful, well-designed, exciting and challening levels with slowly increasing game difficulty
+ 8 awesome boss fights (angry scorpion, dangerous spider, bee cat golem and crocodile boss) in 8 different dark castles
+ great number of power ups, bonus rounds, secret blocks and bonus items
+ over 20 various, great animated enemies such as crocs, cats, frogs, spiders, monsters, dragons, snails and many more
+ great mix between 2D and 3D graphics in very high resolution
+ retro arcade music and old school sound effects
+ perfect, intuitve super game control through retro console games control pad
+ special skills hidden in destroyable blocks and bricks
+ awesome gameplay reminding to retro classic dash games
+ water and sea worlds - jumping, running, fighting AND swimming!
+ try to unlock all achievements and to be number one of leaderboards!

How to play Ladybug Adventures:
+ click right or left on your control pad for moving ladybug super hero girl!
+ down-button is for ducking and also to get to some bonus levels (under tree stumps)
+ press B-button to make Super Ladybug jumping!
+ press A-button AND right or left for running; press A and B together for a higher and wider jump!
+ by eating an apple you will become Super Silver Ladybug, get magic powers and then be able to destroy bricks!
+ by eating golden flowers you will become Super Golden Ladybug and be able to throw fireballs
+ ladybug also can swim sometimes - press A-Button multiple times to swim higher ... release finger from button to go down!

Have fun with this cool new super adventure platformer tale game!
summary: Super LadyBug is a new, super and fantasy game, play adventure and save cat noir
title: Super ladybug

comments: Das Quiz bricht mitten drin ab und funktioniert nicht mehr, musste App schließen und habe Fragen verpasst da bei Quizduell alle drei Fragen ja auf einen Haufen kommen, was übrigens sehr nervtötend ist und mir nicht gerade Lust darauf mach es öfter zu spielen. Und im großen und ganzen hängt die App sowieso sehr oft. Dafür das ARD soviel Geld hat, sollte man meinen sie könnten eine wenigstens mehr oder minder funktionierende App erstellen lassen. Schlechteste Game App die ich je hatte. Hoffe nach den ganzen negativen Reviews wird daran irgendwann einmal was verbessert.
Live mitspielen funtioniert gar nicht

Bitte mehr Notifications, wenn man dran ist, bzw ne neue Frage kommt. Beim Duell kann man vor der Finalfrage nicht zurückgehen, um sich den Spielstand anzusehen, häufig bleibt die App auch hängen....  Finde die App grundsätzlich gut, aber es gibt noch viele Kleinigkeiten und technische Probleme.
Es werden keine Fragen eingeblendet, wieder gelöscht.

Die App reagiert sehr zeitverzögert, was noch das geringste Problem ist. Teilweise darf ich gar nicht mitraten, weil die Frage mir nicht gestellt wird, teilweise wird die Frage nicht Mal eine Sekunde lang eingeblendet und dann war sie wieder weg. Punkte werden mir erst gegeben wenn ich die App neustarte. Die 2 Sterne gibt es für die Idee und die Sendung. Die Umsetzung ist sehr schlecht, bitte überarbeiten!   Edit: die angesprochenen Fehler habe ich jetzt nicht mehr bemerkt. Dafür trat ein anderer auf: mir wurde die Frage gar nicht gestellt und sofort rot markiert und ich konnte nachgucken was die richtige Antwort war (ohne das die tv-show schon soweit gewesen wäre). Nachdem ich die richtige Antwort wusste, wurde mir die Frage dann doch gestellt und ich konnte antworten. Punkte habe ich dann auch bekommen

Die App ist im grossen und ganzen gut. Allerdings sind Fragen zum Teil einfach verschwunden, bevor man überhaupt die Antworten lesen konnte. Das ist sehr frustrierend besonders, wenn man die Arbeit weiss.
description: Die offizielle ARD Quiz-AppIn der offiziellen ARD Quiz App findest du ein breites Mitspielangebot zu den beliebten Quiz- und Showsendungen der ARD. Ganz neu ist das Modul zur Sendung „Quizduell“ im Vorabendprogramm des Ersten. Hier kannst du nicht nur live während der Show miträtseln, sondern mit deinen Antworten sogar das Studiogeschehen beeinflussen! Zusammen mit anderen App-Spielern bildest du nämlich das „Team Deutschland“. Gemeinsam mit dem Teamkapitän im Studio habt ihr die Möglichkeit, um den Tagessieg zu spielen. Neun App-Spieler erhalten bei  gewonnenem Spiel anschließend sogar einen Teil des Preisgeldes – ausgelost per Zufallsgenerator!Auch bei der „NDR Quizshow“ im Sonntagabend-Programm des NDR Fernsehens kannst du mit der ARD Quiz App dein Wissen rund um Norddeutschland live unter Beweis stellen. Vielleicht bist du ja sogar heller als die „Leuchte des Nordens“ im Studio?Auch wenn die beliebte Quizshow „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ im Vorabend-Programm des Ersten nicht gesendet wird, kannst du mit dem entsprechenden Modul in der ARD Quiz App weiter Dein Wissen unter Beweis stellen. Stell dich den kniffeligen Fragen und fordere deine Freunde oder andere App-Spieler zu einem Duell heraus! Natürlich kannst du auch im Spiel gegen die TV-Teams antreten und dich mit Bernhard Hoëcker und Elton messen.Bei den XXL-Ausgaben von „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ am Wochenende zur Prime Time im Ersten kannst du live mitzuspielen. Entscheidest du dich zu Beginn des Spiels für das richtige Gewinner-Team, kannst du mit etwas Glück sogar Geld gewinnen – und zwar den gleichen Betrag, den auch das Publikum im Studio erhält! Viel Spaß beim Mitraten in der ARD Quiz App!
descriptionHTML:
Die offizielle ARD Quiz-App

In der offiziellen ARD Quiz App findest du ein breites Mitspielangebot zu den beliebten Quiz- und Showsendungen der ARD.

Ganz neu ist das Modul zur Sendung „Quizduell“ im Vorabendprogramm des Ersten. Hier kannst du nicht nur live während der Show miträtseln, sondern mit deinen Antworten sogar das Studiogeschehen beeinflussen! Zusammen mit anderen App-Spielern bildest du nämlich das „Team Deutschland“. Gemeinsam mit dem Teamkapitän im Studio habt ihr die Möglichkeit, um den Tagessieg zu spielen. Neun App-Spieler erhalten bei gewonnenem Spiel anschließend sogar einen Teil des Preisgeldes – ausgelost per Zufallsgenerator!

Auch bei der „NDR Quizshow“ im Sonntagabend-Programm des NDR Fernsehens kannst du mit der ARD Quiz App dein Wissen rund um Norddeutschland live unter Beweis stellen. Vielleicht bist du ja sogar heller als die „Leuchte des Nordens“ im Studio?

Auch wenn die beliebte Quizshow „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ im Vorabend-Programm des Ersten nicht gesendet wird, kannst du mit dem entsprechenden Modul in der ARD Quiz App weiter Dein Wissen unter Beweis stellen. Stell dich den kniffeligen Fragen und fordere deine Freunde oder andere App-Spieler zu einem Duell heraus! Natürlich kannst du auch im Spiel gegen die TV-Teams antreten und dich mit Bernhard Hoëcker und Elton messen.

Bei den XXL-Ausgaben von „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ am Wochenende zur Prime Time im Ersten kannst du live mitzuspielen. Entscheidest du dich zu Beginn des Spiels für das richtige Gewinner-Team, kannst du mit etwas Glück sogar Geld gewinnen – und zwar den gleichen Betrag, den auch das Publikum im Studio erhält!

Viel Spaß beim Mitraten in der ARD Quiz App!
summary: Here you can find Mitspielangebote to quiz and show broadcasts on ARD
title: ARD Quiz

descriptionHTML:
Be a super agent and conduct a comprehensive investigation of the case. Many useful clues have been found and it's time for you come out with the whole truth. All the evidence proves that he is the criminal. Collect all evidence and bring the bad guys to justice. It's time to arrest him. Let's go!

Features:
1. OMG. Alan is coming here. He sneaked up on Eric and tried to destroy the evidence. Can he be any worse?
2. Was high school boy Eric injured in the fight? Give Him a head-to-toe health check.
3. Be a super agent and conduct a comprehensive investigation of the case.
4.Great. Many useful clues have been found. Mermaid Princess Mia scratched the kidnapper's arm when she struggled with him. Do the blood test to find the truth.
5. Collect all evidence and bring the bad guys to justice.
6. All the evidence proves that he is the criminal. It's time to arrest him. Let's go!
7. The bad days are over. The mystery kidnapper had been arrested and princess mermaid Mia can breathe again.
8. Good News. Your crush high school boy Eric asks you to hang out. Will he confess his feeling to you? So Excited about it!
9. Oh, no. The gossip girl Lily has just eavesdropped two sweethearts. She couldn't wait to share the gossip with her good friend Kim.
10. Kim is just spoiled and arrogant. How can she accept a boy she likes to date with other girl?

comments: Good looking game ruined by slow combat.   You have 4 team members in the beginning, each with 3 abilities. But only one ability can be used, and everyone has to wait 5-6 second global cool down to be able to use a next skill. Global CD on top of the native cool down is not fun. Each battle becomes just an auto attack for 2 minutes, and takes strategy straight out the window.

The graphics are amazing in the art style is definitely unique. More on the adult darker side. My only complaint is that summoning new monsters to use seems to be pretty hard to do. The summoning stones are hard to come by. And there is no free timed daily summon. It makes it hard to feel like there is progression when you are using the same four Monsters the entire game. Other than that it is fantastic. Spot on.

The game pretty much plays by itself. You enter into a level and it's a one time boss fight and so far that is all there is to it. As far as customization goes you can only equip ruins. I don't think there's an option to change weapon or armor. Lots to read in the tutorial, the lack of voice overs doesn't really bother me. Graphics are good and you can unlock some pretty good main characters, more at level 4. If this was an open world with full customization it would have a been an amazing game. Overall, it's not the worst game on the market!

This game's flashy graphics and sounds can't hide the fact that it's just another auto RPG that plays itself. And not a very good one at that. The skill system only allows you to use one skill between your entire party before entering into cool down. Even if you can reduce the cool down time, that's not a very good system. I really wanted this game to be good, but it's very disappointing.

I feel this game has potential. Well crafted in most areas but still needs something more... oomph. Something to bring you back daily. A way to acquire higher strength characters easier. I want a challenge but not too intensively difficult. Combat moves need faster reload times

The graphics are great and despite being another rpg that mostly plays itself, I think it's a great game. I like the way the game has ben set up and the story is interesting. However I am confused about some of the character options, for instance, I have a MOV and it has a little crown next to it, and it says 'set as main'. What does this mean? If answered, my review will go up.

description: Match Magical Candies with OVER 5 MILLION PLAYERS WORLDWIDE! Challenge yourself to thousands of DELICIOUS PUZZLES in a spellbinding magical MATCH 3 GAME! Join Candice, an apprentice witch, and Cookie, the adorable kitten, through an enchanted land of sweet treats! From marshmallow madness to gooey chocolate waterfalls, discover the tastiest adventure ever! Enjoy this FREE GAME on your own or with friends, by matching deliciously colorful candies, and craft spells to blast your way to the top! Train your brain with a variety of perplexing puzzles, cast fizzy fireworks, and WIN ENCHANTING PRIZES! Spin the daily wheel to claim free rewards and boost your progress to the next level. comments: Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

Hey... I would give this game 5 stars but there is 1 main -VE POINT. FUEL takes TOOOOOOOO LONG TO RECHARGE.  The point of this game is to playyyyyy the game. I don't want to keep waiting. I downloaded your great game TO PLAY it. Please try to solve this issue. I will definitely give you 5 stars if you fix this. Please listen to us and read our comments. Most of us are mentioning this 1 -ve point. Thank you

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

THE BEST GAME IN THE APP STORE! The controls couldn't be any simpler, the graphics are sick, the gameplay is exciting, it's challenging but not impossible, it's crazy addictive, the soundtrack is awesome, and you don't have to spend real cash to advance if you don't want to. Even if you do, you can get a lot of different things for under $5! The developers should have statues built of themselves cuz this kick ass game could easily cost $6 or $7. You all did an amazing job and I can't wait to see what else you genius game creators come up with!!! The other Devs should be real nervous, cuz this game destroys all others. Bow down before the awesome glory that is Fastlane!!!

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

I really enjoy playing this game but it takes far too long to progress. Gems are way too far and few between to enable you to 'buy' better vehicles to defeat the boss. Then you have to also use more gems to get weapons! If you don't spend money it takes a long time to get anywhere. If there were more gems available this game would be a 5 star game.

descriptionHTML:
THEY TOOK YOUR CITY. THEY SHOULD’VE TAKEN YOUR CAR!

Reclaim your No.1 position as you blast past other players and outrageous gang bosses in Fastlane: Road to Revenge!

Pick-up this FREE classic arcade shooter and play anytime OFFLINE!

BUST OUT THE BIG GUNS
• 20 exotic cars to collect and upgrade.
• 10 unique & powerful UAVs.
• Game changing vehicle transformations to rain destruction on your rivals: Talon Gunship, Vulcan S-22, Tempest C-3.
• More gear and gadgets than Elon Musk!

CHALLENGE PLAYERS WORLDWIDE
• Blast your way past players the world over.
• Overtake rivals to steal their score bonus.
• Race through 30 player leagues with escalating difficulty.
• Challenging environments and lethal obstacles.
• Can you reclaim your status as top boss?

RICH STORY CAMPAIGN
• 11 crazed bosses hell bent on stopping you in your tracks.
• Complete the campaign and reveal the identity of the boss who took over your turf.

HUGE SOUNDTRACK
• Actual in-game radio allows you to select your own beats.
• Wide selection of in-game music.


Please note that Fastlane is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases. You can play Fastlane offline but a network connection is required for in-app purchases and League Promotion.

_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://www.fastlaneroadtorevenge.com/
Follow us on Twitter or like us on Facebook to get info about upcoming Fastlane changes:
https://www.facebook.com/fastlaneroadtorevenge/
https://twitter.com/FastlaneRTR/

recentChanges: For Gus our beloved Pug, it has been a long journey. He has been to many places, seen many things, and crashed into far too many rockets.
In this bumper update he is bringing you experiences from around the world with a huge series of events, stay tuned to play them all!
We’ve also spent some time at the gas pumps and made it easier than ever to refuel your car.
Now go take back the city!

title: Fastlane: Road to Revenge

Apparently posting a Nazi swastika with a German flag for all in zone to see is acceptable as long as money is spent.  Come on tap do you really want to be seen in this light.  Money grabbing and hate mongering is all I witness now.

Absolute joke. I have played this game for three years and I have an account in 147 and 387 both accounts I have spent money on. I now can't access my Facebook due to deleting it. I asked t4f to see if they can move me to a guest account from my Facebook what I can't access. saying they can't help me. And also saying this is not my device I have always used. Yes it is the same device
I've been playing for last 8 months 3,4 hours a day I love it. It takes time to understand the game but if you fully understand u won't be able to leave what u had been created

comments: Loved the game for the first few minutes as it is very simple and interesting. BUT may photos temperature started to climb and quickly shot through the roof to a point where it literally burns you! And it kills your battery! For a simple game like this these facts fore me to give only one star. Fix the code and improve the graphics and it can easily get a 4 to 5 star rating.

Great time waster, I've been checking in on it every day for about a month. My biggest problem with the game is that there aren't enough prestige balls, once you get thunder there is almost no incentive to keep playing. I hope that more prestige balls are added in some future update. Otherwise, this is a flawless mobile game. There aren't too many ads, the graphical design is very simple yet effective, and the draw to keep coming back lasts for a long time. It takes a WHILE to get all 5 prestige balls.

Silly pointless battery killing little game, I loved it! The game kinda runs out of puff after level 150 though, as there is nothing else to achieve. I've got all the prestige balls, all the regular balls, all above level 150. Can we have some higher order balls above Thunder please?

This is a cute little fun game but it keeps crashing I can't even open it so therefore that's why you got such low reviews. I was having a lot of fun with it until it started crashing. Even uninstalling and reinstalling did not fix the problem. I hope you eventually get it fixed it would be worth downloading again.

Game play is alright but the adverts are annoying! Especially ones where come back on the game to get points: you can watch video for x2 the amount or just collect... Even the just collect end up watching a video! So might as well just have as x2

Looks BORING at first. But I can't put it down now. And to those complaining about the adds, spam the back button after they start. The only adds this doesn't work for are the ones with the fast forward button in the top left

comments: I gave it a shot and made it up to level 100. But when you play a game where the ai does absolutely everything, it gets boring. You watch the battle unfold and they do this because the controls are really bad. But it gets worse when all the people in game are actually offline. You gain experience offline. Ultimate lazy game for gaining exp for doing nothing. But what annoys me most is the vast amount of quest to do. When I say do, I mean click on and it does it for you... not saying the game is bad by any means. I'm certain there are people that would love this game. Just not my cup of tea is all.

Great concept for a game but good luck trying to play. Its already full of pay 2 win people and they don't let anyone else have a chance to to even do anything without them killing you. So basically, you don't pay, you don't play... it was fun the day i joined a new server though. Has slowly gone down hill and now a week later it's unplayable. Too many wallet warriors playing games these days. Just sad.

While this game can be very fun to play the and yes it is a pvp game there are HUGE downfalls to this. you get people who spend the most money bullying and controlling the servers making it a free pk etc problem with this is the ones who "control" the servers can't be killed so it can't be stopped. don't waste your time or money in the end the bullies and people who bully will make anybody who has spent money quit because it's a 'unbalanced' concept. it should be fixed and more balanced where if you are or have over 3mil power or more on somebody you can't pk that person. in the end you will lose more of a player base bc of this reason bc your cashers are running people off who may or may not have or will spend so less money for the devs if Yall don't do something to balance the pk issues.

Well if you like games that play them selves then this game is for you. 2 stars are for graphics and storytelling in game. I would rather play old Diablo 1 than this game, you have almost no control in game, everything is auto! Auto walk, auto battle, auto sell, auto quest, auto feed pet. The only thing that breaks auto-play is messaging other players and talking to npc. Just make the game a movie its more than halfway there.
The add for this on YouTube is just Diablo 3 gameplay..... Get your own stuff you are  of ripping of a game that people put real hard work into. In fact I feel I should tell blizzard :D

Not good if you want to play this game, there's always people trying to kill you if you interact with players with red on their name. Im trying to level up my character and some random people keep killing my character, you can't have a personal space while you trying to level up, I'm warning you, don't be decieved by the flashy trailer they'll do any for your wallet
description: Experience an awe-inspiring Free MMORPG that lets you control actions in Real-time and embark through a vast fantasy 3D Open World! Immerse yourself into a mmorpg universe of epic atmosphere and darkness through fast gameplay and amplified combat intensity! Meet friends around the world and create Parties to raid treacherous Dungeons or clash Real-time against rivals in the Arena and large-scale PVP Battlegrounds. Gear up stunning Armors, Wings and Mounts to fight against the evil on a Fantasy MMORPG Open World to bring back Glory. Upgrade and transform yourself from warrior to an unstoppable War God!  As the Darkness falls, only the Chosen survive… Prepare yourself and Embrace the Darkness of Dark 3!▶WORLDWIDE SERVERS-	The Action MMORPG – Dark 3 is now available for 165 countries! Party with friends from all over the globe and conquer enemies in the immersive Open World!▶CLANS & GUILDS-   Group up with friends and guildmates, or party up with thousands of other players around the world to take down epic bosses, engage in mass-scale PvP combat, and uncover loot in epic raid dungeons.▶REAL-TIME COMBATS-	Battle against all who stand in your way! Real-time CO-OP and PVP combat means the action never stops-	Beat them UP! Easy to control, one-tap combo and amazing experience▶ENDLESS CHARACTER PROGRESSION-	Choose from wide MMORPG range of heroes: Warrior, Archer or Mage-	Uncover powerful ancient relics, upgrade your weapons, unlock new abilities, and customize your gameplay style-	Collect Tome and unleash the wrath of War, combining brutal attacks and supernatural abilities  ▶EXTREME ARSENAL & CUSTOMIZATION-	Wield a devastating arsenal of angelic, demonic and Earthly weapons. -	Equip your heroes with unique Mounts, Swords, Gears, Weapons and Furious Wings.▶VISCERAL GAMEPLAY -	Challenge Multiplayer Dungeon, Boss World, Urgent Wild and more dynamic quests -	Forge powerful alliances to maximize your growth and rally league to defeat rivals-	Various PvP modes in Arena:1v1, 2v2, 3v3, Team battle and Alliance War▶FANTASY OPEN-WORLD -	Explore a vast, stunning, and lush open-world that allows thousands of players to simultaneously explore, discover, and conquer. ▶OFFLINE AUTO-COMBAT -	Upgrade and kill bosses anytime, anywhere, creating a win-win situation for both work and playOfficial Facebook Pagehttps://www.facebook.com/dark3online/Official Website http://dark3.app4gamer.com
descriptionHTML:
Experience an awe-inspiring Free MMORPG that lets you control actions in Real-time and embark through a vast fantasy 3D Open World!
Immerse yourself into a mmorpg universe of epic atmosphere and darkness through fast gameplay and amplified combat intensity! Meet friends around the world and create Parties to raid treacherous Dungeons or clash Real-time against rivals in the Arena and large-scale PVP Battlegrounds. Gear up stunning Armors, Wings and Mounts to fight against the evil on a Fantasy MMORPG Open World to bring back Glory. Upgrade and transform yourself from warrior to an unstoppable War God!
As the Darkness falls, only the Chosen survive…
Prepare yourself and Embrace the Darkness of Dark 3!

▶WORLDWIDE SERVERS
- The Action MMORPG – Dark 3 is now available for 165 countries! Party with friends from all over the globe and conquer enemies in the immersive Open World!
▶CLANS & GUILDS
- Group up with friends and guildmates, or party up with thousands of other players around the world to take down epic bosses, engage in mass-scale PvP combat, and uncover loot in epic raid dungeons.
▶REAL-TIME COMBATS
- Battle against all who stand in your way! Real-time CO-OP and PVP combat means the action never stops
- Beat them UP! Easy to control, one-tap combo and amazing experience
▶ENDLESS CHARACTER PROGRESSION
- Choose from wide MMORPG range of heroes: Warrior, Archer or Mage
- Uncover powerful ancient relics, upgrade your weapons, unlock new abilities, and customize your gameplay style
- Collect Tome and unleash the wrath of War, combining brutal attacks and supernatural abilities
▶EXTREME ARSENAL & CUSTOMIZATION
- Wield a devastating arsenal of angelic, demonic and Earthly weapons.
- Equip your heroes with unique Mounts, Swords, Gears, Weapons and Furious Wings.
▶VISCERAL GAMEPLAY
- Challenge Multiplayer Dungeon, Boss World, Urgent Wild and more dynamic quests
- Forge powerful alliances to maximize your growth and rally league to defeat rivals
- Various PvP modes in Arena:1v1, 2v2, 3v3, Team battle and Alliance War
▶FANTASY OPEN-WORLD
- Explore a vast, stunning, and lush open-world that allows thousands of players to simultaneously explore, discover, and conquer.
▶OFFLINE AUTO-COMBAT
- Upgrade and kill bosses anytime, anywhere, creating a win-win situation for both work and play

Official Facebook Page
https://www.facebook.com/dark3online/

Official Website
http://dark3.app4gamer.com
recentChanges: Worldwide Servers now available for 132 Countries! Get ready for Global Guild Wars!
summary: Popular Old-School MMORPG’s back! Prepare yourself and Embrace the Darkness!
title: Dark 3

comments: Dev team: It's important to note that there's consistently errors when calculating numbers for the cherries and wheat project. Please reply if you'd like those pics and more importantly please fix this issue asap.  Thank you!

I hate this app. :( I already have a farm, but the app wants me to start over! It forced me to start over, and there is no log-out button. I've spent quite a bit of money on this game between my account and my partner's. So i can't use this app because my 40,000 gold would be gone. back down to the 400 they srart you with. booooooo edit: also, the BF website won't allow me to play on my new laptop at all, because it is run by android. it re-directs to this app, which i am uninstalling. i'm not too happy.

Loved it until I spent hours and a bunch of money trying to get to level 11. The XP points for stuck and wouldn't turn over saying I needed 1 more XP to level up. It kept flashing "level up" with fireworks, etc., but the game wouldn't register anymore XP no matter how many tasks I completed. Totally Annoying! DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME!

description: When Uncle George wills you an old farm, it is your time to step up your farming skills and turn an overgrown field into a flourishing business. Plant, harvest and crop your fields and take care of all your animals. Prove your business skills by selling your crafted goods on the organic market. Build all kinds of fields, stables or production buildings and decorate your farm with stunning decorations. Use your profits, so you can keep upgrading and expanding your farm until you become the greatest farmer far and wide! Live a happy life in the countryside and become close friends with all villagers - Benny, Tessa and all their jolly friends are waiting for you. Meet other farmers from all over the world and become a beloved member of the Big Farm: Mobile Harvest community. Join them in cooperatives. in which you support each other. The harvest year is full of events - follow through the quests of the villagers and let the story of your own farm unfold. No matter if you help the villagers organize a  fairy tale festival, solve the mystery of UFO sightings, or get in the Christmas spirit. Are you ready to build the farm of your dreams? Features❀ BUILD the farm of your dreams with a plenty of buildings and decorations❀ JOIN the community and meet farmers worldwide❀ HARVEST your favourite fruits, vegetables, and flowers ❀ PRODUCE organic foods and farm fresh goods❀ MANAGE realistic production cycles❀ TAKE CARE of your lovely animals and raise chickens, cows, and pigs Take your new farm everywhere. What are you waiting for? Let's get started! Play Big Farm: Mobile Harvest now for free! *This app is completely free to play. Additionally it offers optional in-app purchases.
