description: For a whole new slime adventure join us on board and let’s learn how to make slime together in fun and educational, DIY games!! The game has all the make and play features which not only demonstrates you how to make slime but also teaches you how to make slime fulfilling its purposes to be part of the learning games radar!! There are many ways to make slime and this diy games teaches you all those different methods with fun, engaging and interactive game play features!! The hand indicators will guide you through the game in order to make the most professional slime so that it becomes a great learning and education experience for you!!The game gives you a selection to choose from, which slime you want to make and play with as a first. The first time of slime making includes the slime which only needs glue, water and starch, the second type of slime is added with shaving foam and the third type of slime is made with addition of toothpaste!!Before you officially begin to make slime obviously download and install the game and select your scene which includes the process of making and playing. The first type of slime making includes; glue, starch, water, color and for finishing touch add some fancy glitter. For the second type of slime making the ingredients include; glue, shaving foam, starch, color and water!! Lastly, the third type of slime making includes the following ingredients; glue, shaving foam, tooth paste, color, water and some beads for decoration!!! The official game play with these ingredients include the process of making!! These includes adding all the slime making ingredients together and mixing them all together!! Once the slime making mixture has been make the next is cutting shapes and then the process is followed by placing the slime on the surface!! After it has been placed on the surface to give it different forms and shapes you will use a roller to flat it out and cut it in shapes using a cutter!! The best part is, you can make your own slime shapes as well!!!*** HOW TO PLAY GAME ***Start game Select scene Select slime type Using hand indicators mix all the ingredients; slime is made Cut slime into shapes Roll slime and give it new shapes with stencil Make your own shapePlay with all types *** FEATURES OF GAME ***Fun kids games Hand indicators to help in playing Educational and learning game Different kinds of slime Interactive game play This game can be happily played by people of all ages!!
descriptionHTML:
For a whole new slime adventure join us on board and let’s learn how to make slime together in fun and educational, DIY games!! The game has all the make and play features which not only demonstrates you how to make slime but also teaches you how to make slime fulfilling its purposes to be part of the learning games radar!!

There are many ways to make slime and this diy games teaches you all those different methods with fun, engaging and interactive game play features!! The hand indicators will guide you through the game in order to make the most professional slime so that it becomes a great learning and education experience for you!!

The game gives you a selection to choose from, which slime you want to make and play with as a first. The first time of slime making includes the slime which only needs glue, water and starch, the second type of slime is added with shaving foam and the third type of slime is made with addition of toothpaste!!

Before you officially begin to make slime obviously download and install the game and select your scene which includes the process of making and playing. The first type of slime making includes; glue, starch, water, color and for finishing touch add some fancy glitter.

For the second type of slime making the ingredients include; glue, shaving foam, starch, color and water!! Lastly, the third type of slime making includes the following ingredients; glue, shaving foam, tooth paste, color, water and some beads for decoration!!!

The official game play with these ingredients include the process of making!! These includes adding all the slime making ingredients together and mixing them all together!!
Once the slime making mixture has been make the next is cutting shapes and then the process is followed by placing the slime on the surface!!

After it has been placed on the surface to give it different forms and shapes you will use a roller to flat it out and cut it in shapes using a cutter!! The best part is, you can make your own slime shapes as well!!!

*** HOW TO PLAY GAME ***

Start game
Select scene
Select slime type
Using hand indicators mix all the ingredients; slime is made
Cut slime into shapes
Roll slime and give it new shapes with stencil
Make your own shape
Play with all types

*** FEATURES OF GAME ***

Fun kids games
Hand indicators to help in playing
Educational and learning game
Different kinds of slime
Interactive game play

This game can be happily played by people of all ages!!
developerAddress:
Flat 258 Bld 989 Blk 0333 street 3320
Manama
Bahrain
summary: Learn how to make slime with DIY slimy glue and play with squishy goodness!
title: Make And Play Slime Game Fun

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope– you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

description: Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.Features:▶ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!▶ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!
descriptionHTML:

Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.

Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.

Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!

comments: I bought 3 of these for each of my kids. Turns out I only needed1as only 1 can work on the app but the company happily took the money for 3. Tried to download the app on the 2 little kindles we have but doesn't seem to work on those. What a waste of money. Also, almost all of the kids toothbrushes have really fat bottoms that doesn't seem to fit. I would really like my money back on this

description: After the success of Cheeseburger factory, bhelpuri maker, and Italian food factory frolicfox proudly presents Potato Chips factory for those who love playing cooking and food making games.Potato chips are the most favorite and easily cooked snacks loved by kids and star chef. The great chef makes easy snack right in the microwave and on the stove!Making Homestyle potato chips masala in your own kitchen is fun and easy. Experiment with the thickness; you may like them thicker or thinner. You can use best ingredients to cook potato chips with low fats, like olive oil, safflower, corn, or peanut oil as well as vegetable oil.Potato chips masalas factory game trained you in a way so that you will be able to save a lot of hard-earned cash with less effort. Stop paying too much for the packed chips, instead try out at your own potato chips factory and prove yourself a master chef. Learn how easy it is to make your own homemade potato chips with an easy-to-follow recipe with photos of each step. The hardest part of potato chips cooking is cutting them thin which is easy in our factory with modern cutters and utensils. Enjoy potato chips maker and cooking game on your smartphone and enjoy yourself as a crazy chef.  How to Cook The recipe for cooking potato is very simple and saves a lot of time. You just need to follow the following easy steps. First of all to cook potato chips turn your deep fryer on high. Fill it up about halfway with cooking oil. Wash potatoes, Remove the chaff, sliced the potatoes with the cutting tools available in the factory. Boil the oil mixture and add sliced potatoes in it.  Add the chips to finish off and crisp up. After lifting them from the oil and letting them drain and cool, carefully take them out and put the chips on a plate. Add spices, black pepper, slats, and flavors to make it more delicious. After finish cooking gathers all the chips and starts packing. Pack the chips in colored wrappers and deliver them to the shop. Potato chips factory is a crazy cooking and food maker game for kids, little girls, and boys who love cooking.

comments: Ads and no energy It's fun as long as you get to play it. Unfortunately you run out of energy quickly. Which means you have to wait to continue, which gets really boring after some time. Of course ads help the devs earn some money but the amount of ads here is really annoying :(

Had to uninstall because of noisy ads I reallly enjoyed the game, some tricky questions but if I can't play it anywhere (for example in public places) because I always have to be scared of loud music blasting after each level... Too bad!

This game has way too many "facts" that are straight up WRONG. Sometimes it's just the phrasing, other times the whole thing. This game is helping the population grow more misinformed because they will think the devs did their research. By level 21 I had encountered 4-5 "facts" (which is too high a frequency in my honest opinion) that I could not only prove wrong with my own knowledge, but also with a really quick Google search, so I implore you devs give players an option to report wrong "facts" so you can review them, or just review all of them if you do not want to do that, and just fact-check them.

description: Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.Features•	Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.•	Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.•	Challenging background sound.•	The person with max points will win the game.•	Simple and interesting user interface.•	Invite your family and friends and compete with them.•	Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.
descriptionHTML:
Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.

Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.

Features
• Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.
• Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.
• Challenging background sound.
• The person with max points will win the game.
• Simple and interesting user interface.
• Invite your family and friends and compete with them.
• Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.

So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.

Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.

description: How did you get to this island??  What If it's your last day? It's worse than the apocalypse… Because this isn't just a desert island. You are not alone here... The Island is inhabited by dangerous dinosaurs!!! The Fight for survival has begun...If you like survival games, The Ark of Craft 2: Jurassic Survival Island is all you need! Survival simulator with the best 3D graphics is already here!🔫 Dozens of new weapons and vital resources Apocalypse or desert island... anyway, you have to survive. descriptionHTML:
How did you get to this island?? What If it's your last day? It's worse than the apocalypse… Because this isn't just a desert island. You are not alone here... The Island is inhabited by dangerous dinosaurs!!! The Fight for survival has begun...

If you like survival games, The Ark of Craft 2: Jurassic Survival Island is all you need! This is the best survival simulator you’ve ever seen! Survival, craft and hunt are waiting for you on the island. Play free without internet. Open world is here!

Survival Island features:

💎 Mysterious caves: find a dino cave and collect rare resources
Explore ancient caves full of dangerous dinosaurs and rare resources. Discover new species of dinosaurs! Collect rare resources, craft tools and weapons, build your own house in the open world!

🌴New great 3D graphics
Enjoy the newest version of high resolution graphics in 3D. Survival feels more real than ever. Just imagine suddenly finding an island with giant jungle forest and ancient animals. Survival simulator with the best 3D graphics is already here!

🔫 Dozens of new weapons and vital resources
Apocalypse or desert island... anyway, you have to survive. You can craft weapons: axe, bow and arrows. They will help you to hunt for food and protect yourself in the fight. Enjoy survival craft! Be a real dino hunter!

🐲 Evolution goes on
There is a huge collection of dinosaurs and wild animals on this island. You have your best friend - dodo. It will protect you from dangerous Kentrosaurus. Try to tame wild Pterodactyls! Collect all the eggs and get Nasutoceratops!

🔨 Improved crafting, building and fighting skills
Survival games...this is not as easy as it seems. Be brave even if it’s your last day... The Ark 2 enables you to create and craft more advanced resources for building facilities. If you like survival craft, this game is all you need! Explore open world in all possible ways, you are now a true survivor.

descriptionHTML:
Learn what it’s like to be a real-life veterinarian! Use 3D professional vet tools and become the best animal doctor around! Your adorable, cuddly animal patients aren’t feeling well, and they need YOU to treat them! Examine your furry patients real doctor equipment and help them until the feel all better!


Gain amazing vet skills by learning what it takes to be a real veterinarian! Become the favorite doctor of all the animals in town! The furry kitty, fluffy puppy and soft bunny all need your help! From a bad case of the flu, to nasty scrapes, these fuzzy cuties are all waiting for you to cure them! Challenging puzzles & fun matching games inside!


Features:
> Get ready to be the best veterinarian EVER! Treat the injured animals!
> Examine your furry friends with 3D professional vet tools!
> Dress the animals up in cute outfits & play with them at the park!
> Do challenging puzzles and matching games to find out what’s wrong with the animals!
> Kitty caught the flu! Make an adorable hat and scarf to warm her up!
> Bunny broke his leg! Put a cast on him!
> Puppy hasn’t been seeing so well – give him glasses!
> Kitty’s paw got hurt! Give her a bandaid!
> Tons of mini-games inside for you to enjoy!
> Hooray! You helped all your patients feel better! Now it’s time to play with them at the park!

comments: enjoy this game, welldone!!   Suggestion: can bring 2 or 3 weapons and swap in battle.    Hint for newbie, tripple bow is the key.   Dont waste money on entry level of each weapon, always save for the strongest. 1st start with tripple spear. The poison blowgun is good for earning money in training but very for later game level 80+  Get 25k is pretty easy to earn in daily rewards and training. I can get it in a few hours quickly, each training 4-10k point.

This is an excellent little arcade game with simple but challenging controls. I like the variety of different weapons you get to choose from and the graphics are lovely and evoke a kind of 'dawn of time' feel. The only criticism would be that earning ivory (the in game currency) is slow and there are no other options to obtain apart from buying some.

One of the best challenging game I've played so far. In the beginning it seems a very tough game (specially the terror bird story) but eventually you'll fall in track. One thing I would like to suggest that in gameplay, if there is an option to change the weapon (maybe in between 2 alternatives), then it would be more interesting. Thanks.

- if you are playing the game there is no option to get out of the app or to go to the main menu or restart the play.  - bug: even if the player is dead the game does not terminates this Happens for 5 times in 100 that is not a good show. - I loved played the app but I think you should test the app for the bugs and some missing functional points  - over all I will rate app 4 star & good

Its great and addicting and has very little ads. The only thing I don't like is that the amount of levels needed to move on in the game and the prices if weapons are a bit too much. I would give it like a 4.8/5

The art work, the atmosphere, the weapon choices. It's perfect. I couldn't be more happier that i found this game. The only thing I would personally change is the Tribe Leader's cheering sound. It's a bit silly and is the only thing that truly breaks the immersion of this game for me.

comments: The graphics are nice, but the controls are very hard. Especially in a boat. I finally built a boat, but I couldn't go anywhere because the boat only went in one direction wherever I tried to steer. The pets are very helpful, but there are way too many ads. I placed a campfire down but later it disappeared. I can't move an object I placed, and I accidentally placed a campfire in front of my doorway and I couldn't destroy it nor move it. Changing the direction of furniture would be handy too because I couldn't fit the bed in my tiny house because I couldn't switch the direction it was facing. I also couldn't make more than one thing at a time. If I were to cook food in my oven, I had to wait because I couldn't make something in my workshop while something was cooking.

I see a lot of reviews saying this game is boring. Well, kind of right and kind of wrong. It is tedious getting started but once you figure out what you want to do, this game is like most surviver games. You get resources, build stuff and kill animals. So if you are looking for an action packed kill em all experience, this game is not for you.
Finally i got my wood house and a bad bt in NYT I  go to.bad  take some option when i m nt active I want take rest on my bad. And my all energy get back than it's a cool game well nyc game

I really like this game, it's fun and addictive! One thing happened that I'm not to impressed with though. I got a pet elephant, but it disappeared and now has made everything harder once more. Could you please give me my pet elephant back.

I see a lot of other reviews dissing the adds for a *FREE* game (umm... Use cash for pixels and buy an ad free game then... Making games isn't easy and/or cheap and sponsorship {ads} is how it is funded... stop feeling entitled) My complaint is the lack of directives after initial survival is achieved and well I'm not a guy and would rather have a choice in gender. Fun but much underdeveloped. Love to see this built upon

descriptionHTML:
You don’t remember how you got to this island, but now you’re stranded in the wild. Surviving here will be no simple task. First you’ll need to find food, craft some primitive tools, and build a shelter. Think you have what it takes? Your survival adventure is about to begin…

Game features:
*Explore the wilderness!
*Build your house from the ground up!
*Utilize an extensive crafting system with tons of recipes!
*Meet the island fauna!
*Island survival sandbox simulator.

Survivalist tips:
★Begin with chopping wood in the forest. Wood is used for craft.
★Craft armor and weapons for fighting wild animals.
★Don’t starve, survivor: collect all available resources to keep yourself fed.
★Craft everything you might need.
★Keep track of your health, or you won’t survive…

If you like other survival games, play Survival Island: Evolve – it’ll be just what you’re looking for. Begin your survival adventure now!

*IMPORTANT. Online multiplayer is still in development and will be available soon. Follow our news feed to be the first to know when you can play with friends!

We’re on social networks:
FB: https://www.facebook.com/Survival-Island-Primal-570956786397542/
VK: https://vk.com/survislandprimal

description: If you want to get rid of stress, then pull the lever and throw a cake on face. Our new antistress simulator will definitely help you coping with your stress. Pull the lever, roll the roulette and send a cake on face of your friend, neighbor or anyone else in our new simulator: Antistress Game: Cake on Face.Our Antistress simulator will bring you lots of fun. You have a roulette with cakes, pull special lever and roll this roulette to earn a cake, and then pull the lever second time to throw the cake on face of your friend, sibling, neighbor.  You may spread pieces of cake over whole face of your target. Draw with cream on the face of your “victim” in this antistress simulator you should use your imagination to earn as much fun as you can. The only thing you need to start throwing the cake on face is camera of your smartphone. Turn it on and feel all the “pros” of AR simulator.Antistress game: cake on Face is a free to play antistress AR simulator. Pull the lever to roll a roulette and pick a special cake to throw. Choose your target and throw a cake on face, spread the cream, put a cherry on your target’s head, you are allowed to do everything you want, download and try it by yourself, but be careful, you may catch a cake by yourself!

You may spread pieces of cake over whole face of your target. Draw with cream on the face of your “victim” in this antistress simulator you should use your imagination to earn as much fun as you can. The only thing you need to start throwing the cake on face is camera of your smartphone. Turn it on and feel all the “pros” of AR simulator.

Antistress game: cake on Face is a free to play antistress AR simulator. Pull the lever to roll a roulette and pick a special cake to throw. Choose your target and throw a cake on face, spread the cream, put a cherry on your target’s head, you are allowed to do everything you want, download and try it by yourself, but be careful, you may catch a cake by yourself!
summary: If you want to get rid of stress, then pull the lever and throw a cake on face!
title: Antistress Game: Cake on Face

description: Jumping rooftops and chasing after nasty criminals to save the city is superhero duty. High buildings climbing adventures, falling like death over crime evil thugs. Protect city, fight crime, kill mobsters and live like a true superhero. Enemies capture hostage and harass people with their tyranny and criminal advancements. Win greatest battle against them. All the hand to hand combat champions and assassins have mobbed up against the system. Police and cops have failed. Too risky to involve military to the city and civilian affairs so the crime fighter Action hero is the ultimate choice to overcome the danger. Opportunity to overcome the crime lords who use the military grade weapons and kill hundreds of people every day. It’s a total warzone neglected by the good cops. Now the ultimatum by the terrorists to destroy the city halls and kill the people in the streets. To avoid becoming the city a slaughterhouse run by criminals, break their gangs today. Hero adventure is endless pursuit of excitement and adventure.Future crime battle of mobs and people depends on the Action hero. Crime Fighter Action Hero is one of the best hero games which features the action like movies. Crime Fighter Action Hero is in a strange war against the mafia families who occupies lands and properties of the innocent civilians. The cartel and gangs are into some serious evil businesses like narcotics and heroin. Drug trafficking destroying the neighborhood. Fight off, Gangsters, truly working against the war hero. Chase the crime like a shadow and catch it from the neck. Crime Fighter Action Hero Special features:•	Control territory and make the villains vanish in no time. •	Beat the crap out of thugs and mobsters to teach them a lesson.•	Positive storyline including thug fighting•	Enthralling and smooth gameplay to deliver the crime story of the city.•	Punish criminal agents and help the citizens survive the battle.•	Use the super power for a positive purpose and bring justice•	Beat the invincible crime cults and anarchy promoters.•	Outlaws in disguise of the common people in the streets are your major target.•	Fearless attacks on the thug enemies•	Crime lords are striking with a really big arsenalDownload the Crime Fighter Action Hero free and enjoy applying martial arts against the worst criminals. Enemy is unaware of your powers so strike them with a surprise. Destroy their organizations before the eye blinks. Leave the opponents with nothing but devastation, regret and death bodies of their fellow criminal’s master minds. From heroes to the worst convicts and prisoners, all the graphics and the sounds added in the game are perfect. Diverse characteristics in the animation of each character is fascinating. Monster criminals has a strong alliance with the corrupt government officials built on the base of bribery and extortion of their family members. Defend the city behind lines against the brutal savage criminal minds who have methods of mass destruction and public harassment. Terror is the tool to control the people in view of the destroyers.

How the hell are y'all going to take Hip-Hop, a movement started by black and brown youths, and not put any people of color in the game??  And the icing on the cake is that the white people have dreadlocks. What the ****. A beautiful movement started by black and brown youths in the 70's as a response to the systemic oppression they faced has once again been co-opted for profit, and it's not even done with the right people. And I know for sure that none of y'all can tell me what the four elements of Hip-Hop are. This game is a sick, culturally appropriative joke.
I AM ADDICTED TO THIS GAME. I just can't seem to stop playing. But it also has too many adds other than that the game is great.  graphics, controls, music, moves, and style is perfect😍💓💯✨

comments: I think it is a very good game. But i have a few suggestions that you can make to the game. First you should make it where it shift from daytime to nighttime and when it is on nightime you have the choice to turn on the turn on the headlights. Also you should make it where you have 2 different driving controls. Like you should keep the arrows and add a steering wheel. Also, you guys should add a horn with one of the button options. You guys should also make it where you can ride with other people. One last thing guys you should add a boat people can get on and ride. Please add all of this you guys are awesome!

This is a great game for hanging out, practising quick-scoping and all-round fun. I just feel that you guys haven't put enough effort into this, like you just put something down and left it. People love this game! You need to start making it betterand adding new content, or else people will just get bored. But otherwise, it's great for just having fun killing other people ;)

Can you have us have a friend's list to see who's online I bet  that's what people like me want. Also there's  seats in the vehicle. can you make it were  people for the other person .And last can you make a gas bar were we  refill has with our money that would be cool with a update of a donate Bar were in the server we can donate bet. comments: The game is a lot of fun, very addictive. The only problem I'm having is it seems to close by itself. I'm running it on the Razer Phone so I know I can more than handle this game. No lag, no freezes.. Just random force closure. You should check that out devs. Otherwise, good all round.

I love this game. Every part of it. Even the weird "multiplayer" that's supported by another app... the graphics are incredible, music is intense yet becomes subtle in the background after a bit of playing. It's challenging enough to come back and try again after dying without giving up completely. I have experienced zero bugs or glitches during regular gameplay. You've made the perfect game for me, and I thank you.

This game has little to offer. U just jump over obstacles and thats it. Customizable options are so bad and expensive. Your in the first person prespective so why bother customizing yourself. Theres barely a difference from your default skin to the most expensive skin. But the game is OK i guess. Nothing special

Really cool game. Expect to rage as you move higher up in the loops.  Really wish there was a way to save replays. I love that the devs give you the option to turn ads on and reward you for having them on instead of making you pay to turn them off like other game devs. Keep it up!

In general a pretty good game, but the achievements rarely register. I have a high score of 11, and yet I don’t have the loop 10 achievement. I needed to get past loop 5 about 6 times before it finally gave me the achievement. Other than that though, I liked it.

Two things I've noticed: 1. Haptic is a little laggy; maybe make a section in setting to let users adjust that to their own devices? 2. Graphics are amazing but it seems like the FR is spotty which effects users' game play; maybe add a setting if you haven't already for lower quality options?

description: Do you want to have fun on Christmas holidays? Download our game and you will not be bored in long winter evenings!It is an unforgettable adventure in a mysterious world. In this game there are many randomly generated worlds: from snow-capped mountains and a huge snow-covered forest to tropical jungles and dangerous marshes. To do this, we added a lot of Christmas items to the game, which will create for you an atmosphere of celebration and Christmas magic.Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or get into the wilds of the world in the mode of survival, making weapons and armor to fight its inhabitants. descriptionHTML:
Do you want to have fun on Christmas holidays? Download our game and you will not be bored in long winter evenings!
It is an unforgettable adventure in a mysterious world. In this game there are many randomly generated worlds: from snow-capped mountains and a huge snow-covered forest to tropical jungles and dangerous marshes. Each of these worlds hides many secrets.
Here you will feel the freedom for your creativity. To do this, we added a lot of Christmas items to the game, which will create for you an atmosphere of celebration and Christmas magic.
Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or get into the wilds of the world in the mode of survival, making weapons and armor to fight its inhabitants. Explore endless worlds and build the most incredible buildings, from simple houses to majestic structures.
Have a good game! Merry Christmas!

For all ages.

description: Farm SImulator : 2018 Modern Tractor Drive Game 3D is an amazing tractor driving game where user will play the role of village farmer. Complete every interesting mission of modern farmer games. Tractor drive. Be the best tractor parking driver. In the fields parking simulator of crazy tractor farming mania. User will be growing crops on his fields and to complete this process farmer needs a tractor. Become a village farmer and cultivate your crops. In this new farming tractor simulator free game you will drive a harvester, heavy drill machinery, After obtaining crops the next stage is to transport these crops to markets so tractor again will be used for this process. Take a good care of your large farm and use proper farming techniques to obtain a high yield. The user first have to perform all the operations that are necessary like Land Preparation where tractor will be used with set of blades. Take the best out of your agricultural career by cultivating your mud farm and take your agricultural career to the peaks. The user will plow the fields and later will seed the fields in the main time tractor will be used to spray crops that they never get any insecticides. huge open world of your modern farmland and cultivate or harvest multiple types of crops such as sugar beet, potatoes, wheat, canola, corn, rice, cotton and sunflower. Once the crops are ready the user will transport these crops to the city markets while drive through bumpy roads and rugged terrains while driving offroad tracks. This off road tractor land cultivator extreme farming adventure will train you as a pro tractor driver and gives you great tips of agriculture and crops cultivation. The user can apply powerful 4x4 Transmission while going uphill to the mountain tracks that are narrow. This is the perfect farming season so harvest your crops and grow new crops to sell them to market in a village for money and go through the complete process of growing crops. The curvy and sharp turns are supposed to be dangerous when user will drive a loaded cargo tractor trolley over it. 	Let us explore some amazing features:🚜      Realistic graphics.🚜      Hill climb & Mud drive.🚜      4x4 off road faming tractors.🚜      Open world Village and offroad tracks.🚜      Dynamic 360 camera angles.🚜      Variety of camera views.🚜      Smooth and easy controls.🚜      Multiple controller scheme.🚜      Tilt, steering and button control.🚜      Motion sensor and tilt sensor integration.🚜      Sensitive tilt controls.🚜      Specialized Physics engine.🚜      Weather engine.🚜      Farmer Tractor and Cargo Tractor🚜      Open World sound effects (SFX).🚜      Variety of visual effects (VFX).
descriptionHTML:
Farm SImulator : 2018 Modern Tractor Drive Game 3D is an amazing tractor driving game where user will play the role of village farmer. Complete every interesting mission of modern farmer games. Tractor drive. Be the best tractor parking driver. In the fields parking simulator of crazy tractor farming mania. User will be growing crops on his fields and to complete this process farmer needs a tractor. Become a village farmer and cultivate your crops. In this new farming tractor simulator free game you will drive a harvester, heavy drill machinery, After obtaining crops the next stage is to transport these crops to markets so tractor again will be used for this process. Take a good care of your large farm and use proper farming techniques to obtain a high yield. The user first have to perform all the operations that are necessary like Land Preparation where tractor will be used with set of blades. Take the best out of your agricultural career by cultivating your mud farm and take your agricultural career to the peaks.

The user will plow the fields and later will seed the fields in the main time tractor will be used to spray crops that they never get any insecticides. huge open world of your modern farmland and cultivate or harvest multiple types of crops such as sugar beet, potatoes, wheat, canola, corn, rice, cotton and sunflower. Once the crops are ready the user will transport these crops to the city markets while drive through bumpy roads and rugged terrains while driving offroad tracks. This off road tractor land cultivator extreme farming adventure will train you as a pro tractor driver and gives you great tips of agriculture and crops cultivation. The user can apply powerful 4x4 Transmission while going uphill to the mountain tracks that are narrow. This is the perfect farming season so harvest your crops and grow new crops to sell them to market in a village for money and go through the complete process of growing crops. The curvy and sharp turns are supposed to be dangerous when user will drive a loaded cargo tractor trolley over it.

Let us explore some amazing features:

🚜 Realistic graphics.
🚜 Hill climb & Mud drive.
🚜 4x4 off road faming tractors.
🚜 Open world Village and offroad tracks.
🚜 Dynamic 360 camera angles.
🚜 Variety of camera views.
🚜 Smooth and easy controls.
🚜 Multiple controller scheme.
🚜 Tilt, steering and button control.
🚜 Motion sensor and tilt sensor integration.
🚜 Sensitive tilt controls.
🚜 Specialized Physics engine.
🚜 Weather engine.
🚜 Farmer Tractor and Cargo Tractor
🚜 Open World sound effects (SFX).
🚜 Variety of visual effects (VFX).

title: Farm SImulator : 2018 Modern Tractor Drive Game 3D

You are sent to the crime district with a license for shooting at will.
No one can handle the situation in this place, but you can!
Show the gangsters, bandits, mafia members and other outlaws that the punishing hand knows no mercy!
Find the best cars and weapons, different ammunition and advanced military technique.
Everything is at your command! Your only task is to eliminate the crime and make the city safe for ordinary citizen.

For the honor and courage your duty must be fulfilled!
summary: You bring justice in the name of law!
title: Miami Crime Police

comments: Game is awesome! Butt! It would be better if I could replay my amazing shots lol.  And a better aimer that's not so close to the edge of the screen would be nice. Still a pretty awesome game though,  in my opinion. Probably ridiculously hard for some of you who aren't as good as me but we can't all be pro lmao

Its a great game but the ads on the top of the screen during gameplay aren't cool. It messes with my shots. If you get rid of that I'll give a 5 ☆ rating. I understand that when a game is free the company needs to add ads to make money, but during gameplay on the screen is a little extensive. I don't usually give anything less than five stars,  I'm genuinely sorry. A quick reply would be much appreciated, thanks for your time.

Ruined by ads Well.. I quite liked the game until I finished the first level.. then ads... ads... and more bloody ads... do not get this if you like your game play to be fluid!!!!!  If you like to play a game for 10 seconds then watch 30 seconds of ads every level.. then this game is for you.. I have now uninstalled it.. if I could give minus stars then I would

The same ad ran, after every other level, just too much. I would never dl the advertised game due to it being shoved at me repeatedly. Not much in creativity, a lot of the same scenes just a move of the cup or an added piece. Uninstalled before I get further annoyed.

Fun game, but advertisements are WAAAAAY too frequent to actually enjoy the game (practically every 3rd round). Install if you'd like or don't mind ads all the time, but I didn't make it before deciding to uninstall. Game is absolutely in no way new or ground breaking so you'd be better off with any of the other similar games with far fewer forced ads.

I said if one more add comes up, I'm deleting this game. There is literally a 1 minute add after every single level. This game sucks so bad. I kept my word and uninstalled it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. It's not worth it at all.

descriptionHTML:
This is fully physics based 3D funny street soccer game. All you have to is click one button and try to first 5 goals!

You can kick your opponents head with your legs at the same time, you need stay on ground for defend on your goal!

- Customize your players. You can unlock different forms with earned golds. (more than 40)

- With power up system, each round will be funny.

- You can active 14 Power-ups. Like goals, Small ball, or Freeze your opponent.

- Play against with a friend or try to earn cups in tournament mode vs Hard CPU.

- Challenge in 3 amazing tournament mode. Amateur, semi-pro and Stars league!

- Choose your country and play against another countries!

- With 2 buttons mode support, you can play up to 4 players.


Click, kick and make some score!
summary: Cubic Street Soccer is a fully physics based, one-button funny 3D soccer game.
title: Cubic Street Soccer 3D

description: In this terrifying map for Minecraft you have a unique possibility not only to find yourself in the unusual and creepy world of the popular horror-game, but to play for one of its characters too. If you’re ready to test your nerves, download our new MCPE map for free and imagine yourself a hero of the famous horror-game!In this map for Minecraft you can choose a character, for whom you want to play, and you can a choice of four main heroes: Bendy, Boris, Joe and Henry. As soon as you make a decision, you will get a chest with different unusual things, which will be definitely very useful during the game. Each hero of this map for MCPE has its own plotline and, that’s why things in the chest are completely different, because every character will face special dangers and numerous obstacles. But, nevertheless, no matter whom will you choose, each of this four characters of this exciting map for Minecraft has to go through the maze, avoiding treacherous traps and creepy places, in order to save his/her life and find the way out of this dangerous place. Except this main aim, every character has their own special tasks, which you need to complete too. All action in this map for Minecraft is going on the dark wooden maze, consisting of numerous mazy corridors, cells and creepy places. If you’re not scared, and you’re ready to dive into terrifying world of Bendy and his friends, download our new map for Minecraft for free, and try to survive in this dangerous world of horror-game!You will need to install Minecraft Pocket Edition on your mobile device for this map.DISCLAIMER: This map for MCPE isn’t made or supported by Mojang. Minecraft and Minecraft Pocket Edition are official trademarks of Mojang AB. The developers of this MCPE map don’t cooperate with Mojang. This application fully adheres to the terms set up by Mojang AB. More info at https://account.mojang.com/terms.

comments: Only been playing for a short time but so far it seems very enjoyable. At the moment I can play for free and seem to be progressing. I have noticed a few ridiculously hard levels. I'm not going to pay to win so I had to spend a while building health potions which gets repetitive. Apart from that it's fun over all.

This game is just about money with no reward. Gets boring after a month and even through my power is over 3100 i can't beat 2800 power quests....Ummhmm....seems I do the exact damage I did when I started...mechanics are messed up..and no purpose

Very good game and a great time killer. It can take some time to get your team up to strength to fight certain levels. They have spoiled the game slightly with the all new alliance wars  that some people didn't want. It's impossible to find items to ascend your hero's to the next level to make them stronger. Also to level up troops it costs a lot of in game food to level them up. You need a lot of patience to play this game. If not then don't download. I wish I hadn't now.

I've been playing this game for sorry one year now and I do like it but it has a few flaws.  It takes a very long time to level up heroes, it's very hard to get good heroes because it's just by chance, and you don't get very many gems at a time if you want to get anywhere in this game you have to spend money.  Now they have a VIP 4.99 for a month you get 30 gems a day, and extra regular summon, and instead of just be able to upgrade one building at a time you can do two at a time.  It really is helping me get all my buildings to the same level. There is also alliance wars now and they also have challenges.  With a few tweaks I would give this game 5 stars hands down.  I definitely recommend it.

Great if you buy your way through the game. The fun lasts a few hours and then it's an endless grind of frustration. You won't get any better characters unless you purchase them with microtransactions and will lose....... A LOT.  Greed wins and the sheep that can throw their money at a mobile game will triumph.

description: Ever wondered what happens when you leave your puppy home alone? Does your puppy throw a secret disco party? Does she dress up in the most stylish outfits or ride her skateboard around the house?  Find out what really goes on when you’re not home!  Discover your puppy’s secret life - and get ready to party! Take her to the doctor’s clinic!> Bathe your puppy - give your pet a warm bubble bath!  > Win tons of awesome toys & furniture to decorate your puppy’s room! Choose your type of the world:- Creative: Try yourself as a builder that creates terrain and shelters. Explore all the beauty of the world. It's the place to implement your imagination where nothing limits your possibilities.- Survival: It's the way for the brave ruthless adventurer. There are a lot of wild animals which treat you only as food, so be cautious. Exploration lite in the untouched nature. Set Your Imagination Free;•	Endless gameplay;•	Explore the blueprint worlds!•	Build and create awesome buildings and structures!•	Compare your block worlds/towns/buildings with your friends. *** SURVIVAL MODE FEATURES  ***•	A great number of different monsters.•	After Game Awards.•	Share your results with friends. *** PRIMALCRAFT IS ***•	Millions of players all around the world;•	More than 100 kinds of weapons; •	More than 35 maps and locations; •	Endless possibilities!•	3D game graphics!•	Exploration of the sandbox blocky world! •	City builder game!Play PrimalCraft Game on your own map! - Survival: It's the way for the brave ruthless adventurer. There are a lot of wild animals which treat you only as food, so be cautious. Exploration lite in the untouched nature. You can clone and spawn creatures using eggs in both modes.

*** CREATIVE MODE FEATURES ***

• Be creative! Set Your Imagination Free;
• Endless gameplay;
• Explore the blueprint worlds!
• Build and create awesome buildings and structures!
• Compare your block worlds/towns/buildings with your friends.

*** SURVIVAL MODE FEATURES ***
• A great number of different monsters.
• After Game Awards.
• Share your results with friends.

*** PRIMALCRAFT IS ***
• Millions of players all around the world;
• More than 100 kinds of weapons;
• More than 35 maps and locations;
• Endless possibilities!
• 3D game graphics!
• Exploration of the sandbox blocky world!
• City builder game!

Play PrimalCraft Game on your own map! Create different resources, mine or craft new items and build your own shelter to survive in the nights, stay there and be safe from the block monsters: zombies, pumpkin heads and other aggressive monsters.
Save your health and hunt down eatable animals: cows, horses, pigs, chickens etc. to overcome your hunger mod.

PrimalCraft Game allows you to customize your character by choosing unique skin Survival Craft World!
PrimalCraft is one of the best building simulator!
Try it now with all your friends or family members and win by creating the best city!

This Exploration Lite Game, inspired by the popular mine crafting one, gives you opportunity to design your dream block house in 3D environment, and build a whole cube town! Everything is possible on this Adventure Game! Explore this world and start living your dreams and imagination.

This is all about PrimalCraft where all your city building dreams come true!

comments: Glu games never fail to dissapoint, and Dino Hunter Deadly Shores is no exception. The graphics are satisfying, the weapons are creative and the gameplay is entertaining. I am empathetic, and realize that You need ads to generate income, but the amount of afs in this game is rudiculous Nonetheless, I have had a great experience playing this game, and It never fails to keep me entertained and enthralled. Keep it up!

It is a time killer with some fun for a bit. The graphics are good. My main point of contention is their shady sales practice where they have two GLU credit packs for the same price (say $49.99) one is for 1300 credits and the other for 2500. There is really no difference in the world, except one says credit pack and the other says value pack. It isn't until you get to the payment screen that if you aren't observant that you notice that the "value pack" of 2500 credits for $49.99 is a monthly subscription. They need to clearly state this on the listing so people are well aware before they hit the purchase button. But they won't because they are shady as fu*k

All this stupid game does is cheat. You shoot at the dinosaur and it misses even though you clearly shot it. It doesn't give you enough time to do anything and it's all because free-to-play is poison to the mobile gaming market that has dominated it completely. This game cheats and cheats and cheats and in case I didn't make it clear this is a stupid game that does nothing but cheat and it was designed by cheaters who made a game that cheats. I'm very angry about how much this game doesn't allow you to win.

Hi, the game is pretty nice. I have a problem when I select to hunt with a bow for daily missions. Is there a trick to solve this? The problem look like a half of a screen in vertical, has very bad sync with the other half, and is quite impossible to see the monsters; only after I select to zoom, appear for a moment some clear image, but that is not for long...is just impossible to such mission....please fix this.

This game would be alot better without so many ads. The ads that bug me the most are the ones forced upon you during a hunt. Also had an issue of purchasing an upgrade with in game currency and after confirming the purchase an ad caused the game to crash. After reloading currency was gone and didnt receive the upgrade. If ads were reduced this would be a great game.

I really liked the overall feel of the game, and it isn't too long in loading either. The only thing I don't like is how fast the energy levels wear out. Other than that though it's good, because if you don't have enough money to upgrade to a larger mission, you can do smaller missions to collect more money. :) I would definitely recommend this to gamers.
description: Hunt or be hunted! Embark on the dinosaur hunting expedition of a lifetime to kill the ultimate game in Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores.HUNT DINOSAURSJourney to a hidden, untouched Jurassic island and kill the most ferocious animals in history.  Encounter Jurassic beasts long thought extinct, from the docile stegosaurus to the terrifying T. rex.VISIT EXOTIC Jurassic LOCATIONSKill dinosaurs in lush and dangerous Jurassic environments like the shipwreck-strewn coast, overgrown jungle and dinosaur boneyard!EQUIP POWERFUL WEAPONSLoad up on firepower with destructive weapons like the rocket launcher and shuriken crossbow.  You’ll need a powerful arsenal and an expert shooter strategy to kill these dinosaurs!MASTER A UNIQUE SHOOTER CHALLENGE SERIESProgress through varied shooter series to win rifles, shotguns and assault rifles. Make your kills and complete them all for even greater rewards!EXPERIENCE AMAZING GRAPHICSDynamic shadows, hi-res textures and realistic Jurassic models all combine to make this one of the most beautiful dinosaur shooter games on your mobile device!High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!“It’s as if Glu Mobile was listening in on my mind as I imagined how good Deer Hunter 2014 would be with dinosaurs.” – Kotaku “… I am totally, absolutely, 100% completely behind blasting dinosaurs with guns until they explode, and happily that's exactly what Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores will let you do.” – AppSpy “Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores dishes up tons of behemoth-shooting action. It’s an easy game to enjoy.” – Gamezebo “Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores is a solid shooter. The dinosaurs in the game are very well detailed and the game allows you to jump right in…” – ModojoPLEASE NOTE:- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.-This game is not intended for children.- Please buy carefully.- Advertising appears in this game.- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.- A network connection is required to play.- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game’s “Help” feature.  FOLLOW US atTwitter @glumobilefacebook.com/glumobile
descriptionHTML:
Hunt or be hunted! Embark on the dinosaur hunting expedition of a lifetime to kill the ultimate game in Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores.

HUNT DINOSAURS
Journey to a hidden, untouched Jurassic island and kill the most ferocious animals in history. Encounter Jurassic beasts long thought extinct, from the docile stegosaurus to the terrifying T. rex.

VISIT EXOTIC Jurassic LOCATIONS
Kill dinosaurs in lush and dangerous Jurassic environments like the shipwreck-strewn coast, overgrown jungle and dinosaur boneyard!

EQUIP POWERFUL WEAPONS
Load up on firepower with destructive weapons like the rocket launcher and shuriken crossbow. You’ll need a powerful arsenal and an expert shooter strategy to kill these dinosaurs!

MASTER A UNIQUE SHOOTER CHALLENGE SERIES
Progress through varied shooter series to win rifles, shotguns and assault rifles. Make your kills and complete them all for even greater rewards!

EXPERIENCE AMAZING GRAPHICS
Dynamic shadows, hi-res textures and realistic Jurassic models all combine to make this one of the most beautiful dinosaur shooter games on your mobile device!

High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!

“It’s as if Glu Mobile was listening in on my mind as I imagined how good Deer Hunter 2014 would be with dinosaurs.” – Kotaku

“… I am totally, absolutely, 100% completely behind blasting dinosaurs with guns until they explode, and happily that's exactly what Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores will let you do.” – AppSpy

“Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores dishes up tons of behemoth-shooting action. It’s an easy game to enjoy.” – Gamezebo

“Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores is a solid shooter. The dinosaurs in the game are very well detailed and the game allows you to jump right in…” – Modojo

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
-This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game’s “Help” feature.

FOLLOW US at
Twitter @glumobile
facebook.com/glumobile

descriptionHTML:
It is high time for you to start mining of bitcoins. Get the bitcoins with your own farm. Buy improvements and develop your empire.
They filled the whole house with bitcoins, make all the free space farms, let them get even more bitcoins. In fact bitcoin does not happen much. Sell ​​the cue ball on the stock exchange, along with altcoin and etherium. The constant change in the exchange of currencies, the dynamic rate of bitcoin, the rise in prices, prices are constantly changing. If you like the price, press to sell and get your dollars.
For those who do not know what bitcoin or mining is. Mining is prey. Bitcoin is a crypto currency, a currency very popular on the Internet. There are also alternative crypto-currencies, such as ether, or etherium, altcoin, Ripple - the fastest crypto currency, lightcoin and others.
The game has a huge number of locations that you can fill up with your farms and assim. Asik is a special installation for the crypto currency.
Build your business on a crypto currency, this will ensure you a good payroll in the game, and you can buy a gold installation in your apartment.
Compete with all the ministers of our planet and become the best! Become a Bitcoin Tycoon!

description: Welcome to our Makeup Salon! Is your dream to become a makeup artist? Apply eye shades, eyelashes, glowing blushes, face paintings, glamorous lipsticks and diamond stones. Your imagination is the limit! Make sure you’ll choose a complementary hairstyle and gorgeous accessories to complete the look you’ve created!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to our Makeup Salon!

Is your dream to become a makeup artist?

Now is your chance to test your skills by making countless of makeup combinations, from party makeup to prom or even a bridal one. Apply eye shades, eyelashes, glowing blushes, face paintings, glamorous lipsticks and diamond stones.

Your imagination is the limit! You can make something magical, or something glamorous worthy of a superstar, or a fabulous look for a fashion show, or just a delicate wedding makeup. Be as creative as you want and create unique makeup designs for our beautiful models here. Make sure you’ll choose a complementary hairstyle and gorgeous accessories to complete the look you’ve created!
summary: Become a makeup artist in our Makeup Salon app!
title: Makeup Salon

description: ** School of Driving **Are you ready to be a city driver? Feel free to play any mode, Career, Checkpoint, Drift or Stunt mode. Earn points and get more car...Earn more points and personalize your car with rims and colors.HOW TO PLAY?- Career Mode -* Follow the yellow arrows* When there is direction arrow, use your signal before turning to get more Points* Dont run a red light* Dont crash* Drive on your way* Park your car to the green area- Checkpoint Mode -* Collect marks and turn back to the starting point in given time* Earn points as much as you collected marks- Drift Mode -* Drive fastly and drift in given time. GAME FEATURES- Realistic city traffic- Traffic rules like signal, traffic lights- Amazing and challenging missions- Realistic car sounds- 4 Control options, tilt, steering left or steering right and arrow keys- Different camera angles including Interior View !!- 7 different cars with 5 rims and 7 colours- 60 career levels
descriptionHTML:
** School of Driving **
Are you ready to be a city driver?
Feel free to play any mode, Career, Checkpoint, Drift or Stunt mode. Earn points and get more car...
Earn more points and personalize your car with rims and colors.


HOW TO PLAY?

- Career Mode -
* Follow the yellow arrows
* When there is direction arrow, use your signal before turning to get more Points
* Dont run a red light
* Dont crash
* Drive on your way
* Park your car to the green area

- Checkpoint Mode -
* Collect marks and turn back to the starting point in given time
* Earn points as much as you collected marks

- Drift Mode -
* Drive fastly and drift in given time.


GAME FEATURES
- Realistic city traffic
- Traffic rules like signal, traffic lights
- Amazing and challenging missions
- Realistic car sounds
- 4 Control options, tilt, steering left or steering right and arrow keys
- Different camera angles including Interior View !!
- 7 different cars with 5 rims and 7 colours
- 60 career levels
developerAddress: Yavuz sultan mah. Bezendi sokak no:26 Derince/Kocaeli
summary: ** School of Driving **
title: School of Driving

description: Wow, it looks like you got into unusual dreams about falling humans on a flat floor. It's pretty amusing, but you'll have to find a way to get out of those dreams.Otherwise, you will have to spend eternity in such a dream and fall on a flat floor again and again with other human and beasts. To find a way out, the fall human combined into gangs and arranged a beast tournament in fights without rules to find out which gang is steeper.You will have to fight like an beast with other fall human on a flat floor, so that your gang will become the winner and be able to get out of these strange dreams. Show your wit and use the environment in your favor.Let the laws of physics become your allies in beast fighting without rules between gangs. Let the fall human on the flat floor understand that you can not be stopped and only you and your gang deserve victory.
descriptionHTML:
Wow, it looks like you got into unusual dreams about falling humans on a flat floor. It's pretty amusing, but you'll have to find a way to get out of those dreams.
Otherwise, you will have to spend eternity in such a dream and fall on a flat floor again and again with other human and beasts. To find a way out, the fall human combined into gangs and arranged a beast tournament in fights without rules to find out which gang is steeper.
You will have to fight like an beast with other fall human on a flat floor, so that your gang will become the winner and be able to get out of these strange dreams. Show your wit and use the environment in your favor.
Let the laws of physics become your allies in beast fighting without rules between gangs. Let the fall human on the flat floor understand that you can not be stopped and only you and your gang deserve victory.
summary: Get out from unusual dreams about human fall on a flat floor
title: Human on Flat Floor - Fall Gang Fights

description: SubZone - KamchatkaHere is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D. Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates. Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.~ Cyclops GamesIn this new version:* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.* 6 modern submarines you can command* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vesselsPlease rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better ~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea SkirmishNOTES:  BETA VERSION:====================We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic* updates will be frequent while we get everything working* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems MULTIPLAYER:===================* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped  back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
descriptionHTML:
SubZone - Kamchatka

Here is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!

Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D.

Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates.

Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.
~ Cyclops Games


In this new version:

* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.

* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.

* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.

* 6 modern submarines you can command

* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink

* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars

* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vessels

Please rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better

~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea Skirmish

NOTES: BETA VERSION:
====================
We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic
* updates will be frequent while we get everything working
* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems

MULTIPLAYER:
===================
* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.
* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground
* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host
* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
summary: Battle your friends in the ultimate underwater show down.  Download now.
title: Submarine Sim MMO

description: Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items. You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:- Ultimate ocean survival simulator- Life on raft- Dangerous underwater world- Easy learning craft system- Optimized graphics- Realistic visual effectsDive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
descriptionHTML:
Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!
You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.

But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items.

You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.

Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!

Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.

Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:
- Ultimate ocean survival simulator
- Life on raft
- Dangerous underwater world
- Easy learning craft system
- Optimized graphics
- Realistic visual effects

Dive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
recentChanges: - fixed climb on raft from water
- improved graphics - choose Graphics Quality in the Settings
- new visual effects - realistic water and weather
- you can escape - try to find a way out
summary: You on raft. Survive on raft in ocean. Build, craft, use hook, dive and explore!
title: Ocean Survival 3D - 2

description: FEATURES OF TROLL FACE UNLUCKY•	33 hilarious levels•	2 secret levels •	Simply touch•	Nice graphics•	Fully localized UI in all our languages•	Collect hidden troll keys !•	That’s free ! 😜 In this twisted take on point-and-click adventure, you help some serious trolls get what they deserve. It's a brain teaser full of slapstick jokes, an insta-memes app that sets you off on a quest of epic trolldom. It's the perfect (Molotov) cocktail of a puzzle game, escape game and and point-and-click-adventure. And now you can land some extra levels by downloading the smartphone or tablet app. 😊 Do you question games with happy endings? Do you think there's nothing more hilarious than a stupid accident or a prank gone wrong? Good. Because this is an adventure in top-notch trolling. Lovers of free escape games with lots of levels will revel in this twisted take on the genre, where you lure a series of dastardly and deserving characters to unfortunate fates...creating laughs for everyone else.Each level brings a new Unlucky Trollface, who you're going to help steer into one accident after another with a few well-planned clicks (as few clicks as possible). It's a brain teaser full of slapstick jokes, an insta-memes app that sets you off on a quest of epic trolldom. 😁 Trollface is already a popular series of internet memes and online point-and-click games with black and brown art and even blacker humor—without any excess or realistic violence. It's the perfect (Molotov) cocktail of a puzzle game, escape game, prank session, meme machine, and point-and-click-adventure. And now you can land some extra levels by downloading the smartphone or tablet app.

description: Have you ever wanted to be a Winx fairy and race through beautiful 3D underwater? Now you can! Winx Sirenix Power lets you swimming through Infinite Ocean, taken straight from the 5th Season of Winx Club! Swim through Pillar of Control as your favorite fairy, and gather as many hearts as you can before the time runs out! Race against Tritannus through the reefs and caves, and avoid spells cast by the Trix! Once you complete your training, you’ll be ready to take on Tritannus with super-powerful spells! Save the Selkies today before Tritannus captures them, and stop him from polluting the Infinite Ocean! Features: - Play as your favourite fairy: Bloom, Stella, Flora, Aisha, Musa or Tecna! - Race through 4 different tracks: Infinite Ocean, Shark Eye Mountain, Pillar of -Control and Pillar of Balance, all taken from the TV show! - Spells, shields and Sirenix Power to boost your speed, protection and invincibility! - Rock through 3D underwater with TV songs and soundtracks - 16 levels of game play - Choice of tilt or joystick control Great value packs: - Gamer Pack: play as Stella, and swim through Shark Eye Mountain! - Fairy Pack: play as Stella and Flora! - Princess Pack: play as Aisha and Musa! - Super Fairy Pack: get four of your favourite fairies for one great price! - Twin Track Pack: get Pillar of Control and Shark Eye Mountain in one pack! - Ultimate Pack: Unlock all in one bargain price! comments: Bowls bowling 3D It's a terrific game, fun and skill in deed! One recommendation; have more head to head without having to bet any coins. Betting for some reason slows the game and puts the players in a defensive position when ranked in a lessor tier. It's fun just to play and find people who also just want to have fun without that betting pressure. Make it more friendly, so the players can compete w each other not only to win coins! Please!

A play mode which would follow  miniature  golf  a little  with small  elevation changes , off camber spots , obstacles  jump water , ramp threw tire. Different  playing fields like open parks with bench seats and walking stones for Hazzard.  The pier is cool to play on ,put some open knot holes on it for Hazzard. Multiple  modes to choose  from. The strait up mode is nice ...  but could  be better.  I like world league  it's a blast  and I'm doing very well in it. I gave you a 4star  app plays smooth  and the game itself  is fun. I'll be waiting for the upgrades.

1 star as the game stands at the moment. There is an exploitable cheat mode where a player can make the opening shot very short  against a nearby part of the pier. Once that is done the second player cannot make a shot.  This is used far too often by cheating players.  Sort this and the game is playable.

TONY Revised from 2 stars to 4 stars as this as said before is an excellent game would have been 5 stars if it was not for the fact the top 10 or so players have a way to cheat without playing a game. So annoying and unfair. I suggest blanket the top 20 or so players to the same prize or find a way to stop them. Cheers for a great game though

Marc This game has made a big improvement since I last uninstalled. The is however a major glitch. When the Jack goes in the water it is replaced back where it started. This allows the leading player a massive advantage as all they need to do is pin the jack and will never lose an end, if the Jack is shot out please either play a dead end or put the Jack in the middle. More experienced players play the Jack to the side every time because they know they will win the end. Alternatively put a barrier in.

Fairly addictive I've grown to love this game. The gameplay is pretty smooth, with just an occasional hiccup. My one gripe is that it can take a while for the game to find you someone to play! By the way, how do you get into Season 3?

comments: Has a lot of potential. The game itself at this point isn't that good, at least for me, because I want it to be like.. sims. The characters need a bit of free will, what I mean is I can control the main character freely, and talk to the children and not being like a mannequin. The control for the camera is a bit weird. Overall... hmm... I don't like it.. because it looks like a kids game.

I don't think levels are nessecary. Basically, they don't exactly apply to anything so put them in 'task list' based on days you need to do. Also,controls and graphics are pretty good but try to polish them a bit. It needs some work. Please make this more interesting.

It's an okay game. I beat it all the way to level 18 and there wasn't anymore levels. Needs more independence upon what mom does. Also kind of childish to keep having the navigating hand. The graphics could be better as well. But good concept. Once more is added I'll  reinstall it and rate it over. Thanks

Bad controls make it very frustrating. There's just not much going on but walking around with extreme difficulty due to controls. Also the neighbors houses are tiny if you walk up to one the front door only goes to your waist.
Why does mom have to do tasks like find husband's socks while he stands still=annoying. ALSO THE CAMERA BLOCKS THE PLAYER'S VIEW =even more annoying. But good job on the graphics
Too many ads! Every time I go to the next level I have to wait for ages and by the time its loaded I am bored! Maybe make the levels last longer? Other than that its OK!
description: This game is a variant of Virtual DAD, and just as fun! Virtual In the midst of a hectic urban neighborhood, Mom is up and ready to take on the day. You’re the boss here. Take care of tough tasks like managing all the household activities at once! Get all your daily tasks done in time to progress to the next day! If you fall behind, your family will, too! This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Wash the monstrous mountain of dishes. Prepare your kids’ breakfast and lunches, and get them ready for school. Take care of the gardening in the backyard, clean the car, feed and walk the dog, vacuum the whole house, and more! Step into the shoes of a mom’s daily life. This game plays on the element of surprise. Expect the unexpected, as surprise events will pop up during your routine, and make your day much more difficult! The completion of every level increases the variety and difficulty of tasks.The life of a mom is demanding. Don’t let your family down! Be a SUPERMOM for your family!Virtual Mom Happy Family 3D Features:• High Quality 3D Graphics• Awesome Sounds for Maximum Fun! • Smooth and Easy Controls• Addictive Game Play• Super Cool House Environment• Family Woman Life Simulation• Daily Household Tasks Based Missions to Complete
descriptionHTML:
This game is a variant of Virtual DAD, and just as fun!
Virtual In the midst of a hectic urban neighborhood, Mom is up and ready to take on the day. You’re the boss here. Take care of tough tasks like managing all the household activities at once! Get all your daily tasks done in time to progress to the next day! If you fall behind, your family will, too! This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Wash the monstrous mountain of dishes. Prepare your kids’ breakfast and lunches, and get them ready for school. Take care of the gardening in the backyard, clean the car, feed and walk the dog, vacuum the whole house, and more!

Step into the shoes of a mom’s daily life. This game plays on the element of surprise. Expect the unexpected, as surprise events will pop up during your routine, and make your day much more difficult! summary: Without Mom, the family is in despair!
